meaning.zh: n. 邮政，邮递系统；邮件，信件；电子邮件；铠甲，锁子甲；（某些动物的）甲壳，鳞；邮车，邮政运输工具；邮件包，邮袋；邮报（用于报纸名称）; v. 邮寄；用电子邮件发送；给……披上铠甲; 【名】 （Mail）（法）马伊（人名）

meaning.zh: adj. 主要的，最大的
meaning.en: Short for mainline.

meaning.zh: adj. 男性的；（动物）公的，雄性的；只有雄蕊的；全由男性组成的；（工具部件等）凸形的，阳的；男性特有的; n. 男子，男孩；雄性动物；雄性植物; 【名】 （Male）（英）梅尔，（柬）马尔，（意、西、塞）马莱（人名）
meaning.en: One of the male (masculine) sex or gender.

meaning.zh: n. 饲料；糊状物；麦芽浆
meaning.en: n. a mixture of mashed malt grains and hot water; used in brewing; n. mixture of ground animal feeds; v. to compress with violence, out of natural shape or condition; v. talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions

meaning.zh: n. 团，块；大量，许多；（常指混乱的）一群，一堆；大量的东西；群众，平民百姓；大多数，多数；质量；（尤指罗马天主教的）弥撒；弥撒曲; adj. 民众的，大量的; v. （使）聚集，（使）集结
meaning.en: (physical) Matter, material.

meaning.zh: v. （使）熔化，融化；（逐渐）减少，消失；（使）软化，变得温柔；变成，融入
meaning.en: Molten material, the product of melting.

meaning.zh: v. 缝补，修补；修理；愈合，痊愈；弥合（分歧），解决（争端）；（给火）添燃料
meaning.en: A place, as in clothing, which has been repaired by mending.

meaning.zh: adj. 仅仅，只不过；只凭……就足以
meaning.en: n. a small pond of standing water; adj. being nothing more than specified; adj. apart from anything else; without additions or modifications

meaning.zh: n. 肮脏，杂乱；不整洁或邋遢的人（或物）；掉落的东西，溅出的东西；（动物的）粪便；困境，混乱局面；处于困境的人；（军队的）食堂，交谊厅； 大量；（尤指引不起食欲的）半干半稀的一份食物; v. 弄脏，弄乱；玩弄；随地便溺；在军人食堂就餐; 【名】 （Mess）（德、罗）梅斯（人名）
meaning.en: n. a state of confusion and disorderliness; n. informal terms for a difficult situation; n. soft semiliquid food; n. a meal eaten in a mess hall by service personnel

meaning.zh: adj. （伤病）不严重的，轻微的；（感觉或表情）不强烈的，微弱的；（惩罚或批评）不严厉的；轻的，不过度的；（味道）清淡的，不刺激的；（药物、化妆品等）柔和的，无副作用的；（肥皂、洗涤液）温和的，不伤皮肤的；（天气）和煦的，温暖的；（人或其行为）和善的，随和的; n. 淡味黑啤; 【名】 （Mild）（瑞典、德、捷、芬）米尔德（人名）
meaning.en: adj. moderate in type or degree or effect or force; far from extreme; adj. humble in spirit or manner; suggesting retiring mildness or even cowed submissiveness; adj. mild and pleasant

meaning.zh: n.  英里；一英里赛跑；很长的距离；很多，远远地；英里
meaning.en: n. a unit of length equal to 1760 yards; n. a unit of length used in navigation; equivalent to the distance spanned by one minute of arc in latitude; 1,852 meters; n. a large distance; n. a former British unit of length once used in navigation; equivalent to 1828.8 meters (6000 feet)

meaning.zh: n. 僧侣，修道士
meaning.en: n. a male religious living in a cloister and devoting himself to contemplation and prayer and work; n. United States jazz pianist who was one of the founders of the bebop style (1917-1982)

meaning.zh: 更多的
meaning.en: greater amount

meaning.zh: n. 苔藓，藓类植物；苔藓绿（moss green）；（苏格兰，北英格兰）沼泽（尤指泥炭沼）
meaning.en: n. tiny leafy-stemmed flowerless plants

meaning.zh: n. 骡，骡子；越境运毒者；（室内使用的）拖鞋；杂交动物，杂交植物；走锭纺纱机；（尤指电动的）小型拖拉机，小型电动机车；（正、反两面的图案不相配的）错铸硬币; 【名】 （Mule）（英）米尔，（意）穆莱（人名）
meaning.en: n. hybrid offspring of a male donkey and a female horse; usually sterile; n. a slipper that has no fitting around the heel

meaning.zh: n. 错误的观点，荒诞的说法；神话，神话故事；虚构的人（或事），想象中的人（或事）

meaning.zh: n. 钉子；指甲，趾甲；（一些软喙鸟类）上喙的硬甲壳；纳尔（布匹长度单位）
meaning.en: n. horny plate covering and protecting part of the dorsal surface of the digits; n. a thin pointed piece of metal that is hammered into materials as a fastener; n. a former unit of length for cloth equal to 1/16 of a yard; v. attach something somewhere by means of nails

meaning.zh: 名字
meaning.en: what you're called

meaning.zh: 靠近
meaning.en: close to

meaning.zh: n. 海角；突端
meaning.en: n. a strip of land projecting into a body of water

meaning.zh: pron. 全无
meaning.en: A person without religious affiliation.

meaning.zh: adj. 含油的，涂油的；（食物）含油多的，富含脂肪的；（头发或皮肤）油质的，油性的；（质地、味道、气味、形态）像油的；（人，行为）油滑的，讨好的

meaning.zh: prep. 到……之上，向……之上，到，朝；（建筑物、房间、门或窗）面朝，通向；发现（某人做了坏事）；了解，掌握，处于有利地位；与……谈话，询问；到（交通工具）上；（重心移动）到（身体某部位）上；成为（列表、系统等）的一部分；转到（其他话题）；抓住；（数）映射到的; adj. 映射的，映成的，满射的
meaning.en: adjective. (of a function) Assuming each of the values in its codomain; having its range equal to its codomain.; preposition. Upon; on top of.; preposition. Aware of.

meaning.zh: adj. 口头的，口述的；口的，口腔的；（药物）口服的；（语音）口腔发声的；（社会）没有文字的；（心理分析）口欲的，口唇的; n. （尤指外语）口试；（大学里的）口试; 【名】 （Oral）（土）奥拉尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. an examination conducted by word of mouth; adj. using speech rather than writing; adj. of or relating to or affecting or for use in the mouth; adj. of or involving the mouth or mouth region or the surface on which the mouth is located

meaning.zh: n. 步速，（移动的）速度；（发生、进展、发展的）速度，节奏；一步，一步之距；（马行走或奔跑的）步法；步态；快节奏；快跑的能力；（板球）（影响球速的）两个三柱门之间的场地状况; v. （因担忧、紧张或不耐烦而）踱步，踱步于；（在赛跑中）为……定速度；为……领跑；为（书、电影等中的故事）设定节奏；调整自己的工作（或活动）节奏；步测；（马）走侧对步（主见于专门饲养或训练的马）; prep.  （用于人名前，委婉提出不同意见）请……原谅; 【名】 （Pace）（捷）帕采，（英）佩斯，（法）帕斯，（罗）帕切（人名）
meaning.en: Step.

meaning.zh: adj. （工作等）有偿的，付费的；有报酬的，领取薪金的；（用在复合词中）报酬……的；（休假）带薪的
meaning.en: adj. marked by the reception of pay; adj. involving gainful employment in something often done as a hobby; adj. yielding a fair profit

meaning.zh: n. 疼痛，伤痛；苦恼，悲痛；讨厌的人（或事）（=pain in the neck）；努力，苦心（pains）; v. 使痛苦，使苦恼；使疼痛；（身体某一部分）感到疼痛; 【名】 （Pain）（意）帕因，（俄）派因，（法）潘，（英）佩因（人名）
meaning.en: n. a symptom of some physical hurt or disorder; n. emotional distress; a fundamental feeling that people try to avoid; n. a somatic sensation of acute discomfort; n. a bothersome annoying person

meaning.zh: adj. （脸色）苍白的；（颜色）浅的，淡的；（光线）暗淡的，微弱的；较差的，逊色的

meaning.zh: n. 手掌，手心；（手套的）掌部；（制帆工用的）护掌；棕榈树；（作为奖赏或胜利象征的）棕榈叶；鹿角的扁平部分; v. 把……藏在手中（尤指玩戏法）；（篮球）持球犯规；用手挡（球）; 【名】 （Palm）（英）帕姆，（瑞典）帕尔姆，（法、德、俄、捷、芬、挪）帕尔姆（人名）
meaning.en: n. the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers; n. a linear unit based on the length or width of the human hand; n. any plant of the family Palmae having an unbranched trunk crowned by large pinnate or palmate leaves; n. an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event

meaning.zh: adj. 过去的，昔日的；刚过去的，刚结束的；完成的，结束的；（语法）过去时的
meaning.en: To change place.

meaning.zh: v. 采，摘（花、果）；（用手指）弄掉；找茬；捡，抱起；选择；弹，拨（弦）；撬开（锁），扒窃……中的东西；小心走路（~ one's way）；（反复地）拔，拉，撕，扯；没胃口地吃；（高尔夫）拾球（尤指认输的拾球）（~ up）；采，摘（花、果等）; n. 精华（the pick of）；选择，选择权；被选中的人（或事物）；鹤嘴锄；（吉他的）拨子；（尖状的）挖撬工具；（篮球）掩护; 【名】 （Pick）（英、法、德、捷、匈、瑞典）皮克（人名）
meaning.en: A tool used for digging; a pickaxe.

meaning.zh: n. 管子，管道；烟斗；管乐器；（管风琴的）音管；（苏格兰的）风笛（pipes）；（人或动物的）叫声，歌声；葡萄酒桶；（计算机）管线命令；符号"|"; v. 用管道运输；传送，播送（音乐、录音）；用管乐器吹奏；（吹长口哨）召集，召唤；高声说话，尖声唱；在食品（尤指蛋糕）上裱花；（为衣服或室内陈设品）拷边，滚边；插枝繁殖; 【名】 （Pipe）（匈）皮佩，（英）派普（人名）

meaning.zh: 计划
meaning.en: arrangement

meaning.zh: n. 插头；插座；（洗涤槽或浴缸的）塞子；堵塞物；棉球，药棉；螺钉楔子；（车辆引擎的）火花塞；推销，宣传；（压实的）块，口嚼烟；（婴儿的）橡皮奶头；岩颈；（供移植的）幼苗，草皮；鱼饵；消防栓；疲惫的马; v. 堵，塞；补足；接电源，插插头；推广，宣传；射击，射杀；艰难地走，埋头于

meaning.zh: prep. 加；外加，而且；（温度）零上
meaning.en: A positive quantity.

meaning.zh: n. 诗人
meaning.en: A person who writes poems.

meaning.zh: n. 杆，柱；地极；截然相反的两极之一；磁极；滑雪杖（ski pole 的简称）；简易鱼竿；直干幼树；电极；车辕；（几何）（球体的）轴极；（几何）（极坐标的）极点；（细胞、器官、身体部分的）极；杆（尤指用来测量土地长度的单位）; v. 用篙撑（船）; n. （Pole）波兰人; 【名】 （Pole）波列（人名）

meaning.zh: n. （人工或自然的）池塘；大西洋（the pond）
meaning.en: n. a small lake

meaning.zh: 猪肉
meaning.en: pig meat

meaning.zh: n. 港口，避风港；口岸，港口城市；（计算机）端口，接口；波尔图葡萄酒（产自葡萄牙）（=port wine）；（船、飞机等的）舷门，舷窗；射击孔，枪眼（=gun port）；通道，排气口；城门，城门洞；（计算机）移植（软件）；姿势，姿态；（军）斜持枪位置；旅行箱，旅行包; v. 转移，移植（软件）；使（船，舵）向左转；（军）斜持枪; 【名】 （Port）（英）波特，（法）波尔，（德、俄、匈、捷）波尔特（人名）

meaning.zh: n. 泵，抽水机；平底鞋，轻软舞鞋；高跟无带女鞋；抽吸，泵送；（生理）泵（指特定离子逆浓度梯度进行的跨膜主动运输机制）; v. 用泵（或泵样器官等）输送；快速上下（或内外）运动；涌出，涌流； 盘问，套问； 让某人使用大量药物； 举重（pump iron）；给......洗胃； 不断制造（pump out）；大量增加（pump up）；接连发射; 【名】 （Pump）（美、俄、印、泰、加）蓬普（人名）
meaning.en: A device for moving or compressing a liquid or gas.

meaning.zh: adj. 纯的，不掺杂质的；血统纯的，纯种的；纯真的，贞洁的；干净的，不含有害物质的；无杂色的，清晰而优美的；完全的，纯粹的；（科学或研究）纯理论的，抽象的；（元音）单音的，纯音的; 【名】  （Pure）（俄）普雷（人名）
meaning.en: One who, or that which, is pure.

meaning.zh: v. 推，移动；按；挤，推搡；推动，促使；推销，推广；说服，强迫；鼓励，督促；努力争取；坚持地做；（军队）挺进；赶走；贩卖（毒品）；接近（某年龄或数字）；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对（底片）作增感处理; n. 推 ；按；努力；鼓励，敦促；挺进，进攻 ；毅力，进取心；棘手的事
meaning.en: A short, directed application of force; an act of pushing.

meaning.zh: 赛跑
meaning.en: speed contest

meaning.zh: n. 盛怒，狂怒；粗暴的举动，愤怒的行为；（喻）（自然事物的）狂暴，凶猛；风靡一时，非常流行；强烈的欲望，激情；（尤指预示的、诗意的或武力的）狂热； 欢乐聚会，热闹的活动; v. 发脾气，大怒；（战斗、争论）激烈进行，（暴风雨）肆虐；（火灾、疾病）迅速蔓延，快速扩散；（感情）强烈表现，变得强烈；狂欢，出去作乐; 【名】 （Rage）（丹）拉厄（人名）
meaning.en: Violent uncontrolled anger.

meaning.zh: n. 铁路系统；铁轨，轨道；栏杆，扶手；（挂物用的）横杆；（赛马或赛狗场的）围栏；（镶板门或上下推拉窗的）横档，冒头；冲浪板（或帆板的）边缘；（电子）定电位导体轨；秧鸡; v. 用栏杆把……围起，把……隔开；谴责，抱怨；由铁路运送（货物）；（风帆冲浪用语）斜板滑行
meaning.en: n. a barrier consisting of a horizontal bar and supports; n. short for railway; n. a bar or pair of parallel bars of rolled steel making the railway along which railroad cars or other vehicles can roll; n. a horizontal bar (usually of wood)

meaning.zh: n. 军衔，军阶；（社会、团体中的）地位，等级；（尤指较高的）地位；（警察、士兵等的）队列，行列；排，列；横排，棋盘横格；组织（或机构等）中的全体人员（ranks）；普通士兵（the ranks）；出租车候车站（=taxi rank）；（数）秩；（统计）次序排列；（系统语法用语）（一个或一组语言单位的）阶，级; v. 把……分等级，属于某等级；级别高于，地位高于；排列，使排成行; adj. （植被）茂密的，芜生蔓长的；难闻的，恶臭的；（强调质量、状况等）极端的，糟糕的; 【名】 （Rank）（英、德、芬、捷）兰克（人名）
meaning.en: n. a row or line of people (especially soldiers or police) standing abreast of one another; n. relative status; n. the ordinary members of an organization (such as the enlisted soldiers of an army); n. position in a social hierarchy

meaning.zh: adj. 少见的，不常发生的；稀罕的，珍贵的；半熟的，半生的；（品质）极好的，杰出的；（空气）稀薄的，缺氧的；非常的，极度的
meaning.en: A scarce or uncommon item.

meaning.zh: n. 礁，暗礁，礁脉；（尤指含金的）矿脉；缩帆部，帆的可收缩部
meaning.en: n. a submerged ridge of rock or coral near the surface of the water; n. a rocky region in the southern Transvaal in northeastern South Africa; contains rich gold deposits and coal and manganese; v. lower and bring partially inboard; v. roll up (a portion of a sail) in order to reduce its area

meaning.zh: v. 相信，信赖；依靠，依赖
meaning.en: v. have confidence or faith in

meaning.zh: v. 休息，歇息；使（运动员）暂时离队； （问题，事情）被搁置；（被）支撑，（使）倚靠；安息，长眠；在于，存放于；（目光）停留（rest on）；依靠，仰仗（rest on/upon）；寄（希望）于，相信；让（土地）休耕；（原告或被告）完成向法庭提出证据（或辩论）；保持不变；（演员）无戏可演; n. 休息（时间）；剩余部分，余下的人（物）（the rest）；静止，停止；（音乐的）休止，休止符；（演说或诗句的）停顿；撑架，支座；（剖）（器官或组织的）一小碎块；（网球）对打，回合; 【名】 （Rest）（美）雷斯特（人名）
meaning.en: n. something left after other parts have been taken away; n. freedom from activity (work or strain or responsibility); n. a pause for relaxation; n. a state of inaction

meaning.zh: adj. （水果、谷物等）成熟的；（奶酪）熟的，（酒）芳醇的；（气味）浓烈的，刺鼻的，（香气）馥郁的；时机成熟的，适宜的；充满……的（ripe with）；高龄的，高寿的；（雌性鱼， 昆虫）快要产卵的； (言语) 下流的，粗俗的; 【名】 （Ripe）（意，瑞典）里佩（人名）
meaning.en: A fruit or vegetable which has ripened.

meaning.zh: v. （数字、 数量、价值）增加；升高，上升；起身，站起；（权力或地位）提高；耸立，隆起；（声音）变响，变大；（太阳、月亮）升起；（感情或情绪） 变得强烈；（面包、蛋糕等）发酵；起床；复活，再生；休会，休庭；（风力）加强，增强；（河流）发源；起义，反抗；脸红，涨红；（毛发）竖起；（胃）感到恶心；接近（某个年龄）; n. （数量或水平的）增加，改善；加薪；（地位的）升高，增强；上升，升起；小山丘，斜坡；（声音或声调的）提高；源头，起源；兴起，高涨
meaning.en: n. a growth in strength or number or importance; n. the act of changing location in an upward direction; n. an upward slope or grade (as in a road); n. a movement upward

meaning.zh: n. 危险，风险；危险的人（或事物），隐患；（按风险大小评估的）被保险对象，受贷者；（保险业承保的）险；金融风险; v. 使遭受（失去、毁坏或伤害的）危险；冒......的危险，担......的风险；冒险做，（明知结果而）大胆做; 【名】 （Risk）（英、阿拉伯）里斯克（人名）
meaning.en: A possible adverse event or outcome

meaning.zh: 房间
meaning.en: enclosed space

meaning.zh: n. 毁坏，毁灭；破产，身败名裂；祸根； 残垣断壁，废墟；残存部分（ruins）
meaning.en: n. an irrecoverable state of devastation and destruction; n. a ruined building; n. the process of becoming dilapidated; n. an event that results in destruction

meaning.zh: v. 冲，奔；把（某人或某物）迅速送往；赶紧做，仓促做；催促，使赶紧；（水、液体等）快速流动；（因感到尴尬）某人的脸/面颊涨红；向……猛冲，猛攻；（大学生联谊会通过举办聚会等）招纳，招收（新会员）；办理手续加入（大学生联谊会）；（美橄）突袭（对方队员，尤指枢纽前卫）；（美式橄榄中）跑动带（球）；仓促生产并分发，匆匆出售（rush something out）; n. （尤指一群人的）冲，奔；（空气、水等）湍流；匆忙，赶紧；（人流或交通的）高峰时间（the rush）；（很多人）争做，急需；迸发的情绪，情绪迸发；（因吸食毒品或因兴奋事物产生的）一阵激动；工作样片（rushes）；灯心草（常用来编筐）；（美橄）突袭对方队员（尤指枢纽前卫）；（美式橄榄球中的）跑动带球；（大学生联谊会的）招新活动；（美国大学生联谊会的）纳新活动（时间）; 【名】 （Rush）（英）拉什（人名）
meaning.en: n. the act of moving hurriedly and in a careless manner; n. a sudden forceful flow; n. grasslike plants growing in wet places and having cylindrical often hollow stems; n. physician and American Revolutionary leader; signer of the Declaration of Independence (1745-1813)

meaning.zh: n. 沙，沙子；沙堆，沙地；沙滩，沙漠（sands）；沙石层，沙层；（尤指大于0.06毫米的沙粒构成的）沉积沙土；沙土色，浅黄灰色；坚定，刚毅; v. （用砂纸或打磨机）磨光；撒沙于，铺沙于；使撒沙似地布满；给……掺沙子; 【名】 （Sand）（英、德、意、芬、罗、捷、挪、瑞典）桑德，（法）桑（人名）
meaning.en: n. a loose material consisting of grains of rock or coral; n. French writer known for works concerning women's rights and independence (1804-1876); n. fortitude and determination; v. rub with sandpaper

meaning.zh: 扫描
meaning.en: examine

meaning.zh: 轮船
meaning.en: large boat

meaning.zh: 购物
meaning.en: buy things

meaning.zh: v. 关闭，合上；把……关在；（使）停止运作，（使）停止营业；禁止通行，封闭
meaning.en: Closed, shut.

meaning.zh: v. 叹气，叹息；（风）呼啸，呜咽；叹息着说； 渴望，思慕
meaning.en: n. an utterance made by exhaling audibly; n. a sound like a person sighing; v. heave or utter a sigh; breathe deeply and heavily; v. utter with a sigh

meaning.zh: n. 指示牌，标志；迹象，征兆；示意动作，手势；手语动作；符号，记号；踪迹，踪影；（医）征，体征；神迹（主要用于《圣经》和文学作品中）；（野生动物的）足迹，臭迹；（占星）（黄道12宫中的）宫，星座；（数）正负号；暗号，信号；（表示某人状况或经历的）动作，反应; v. 签名，署名；（与机构、公司等）签约；示意，打手势；打手语；用标志杆（或其他记号）表示
meaning.en: (sometimes also used uncountably) A visible indication.

meaning.zh: n. 丝绸，丝线；（骑手在赛马时穿的）彩色丝绸赛马服（silks）；绸制赛马帽顶（盖）；王室律师；（雌玉米穗的）穗丝；蜘蛛丝; adj. 丝的，丝制的; vi. （玉米）处于长须的阶段中; 【名】 （Silk）（英、瑞典）西尔克（人名）
meaning.en: n. a fabric made from the fine threads produced by certain insect larvae; n. fibers from silkworm cocoons provide threads for knitting

meaning.zh: 水槽
meaning.en: washing basin

meaning.zh: n. 皮，皮肤；兽皮，皮毛；（水果或蔬菜的）外皮；香肠衣；（液体表面凝结的）薄皮，薄层；（建筑物、飞机等的）外壳；卷烟纸；（软件、网站等的）界面，皮肤；光头；（盛液体的）皮囊；雪橇外皮，防滑底层（用海豹皮或其他材料做成，系于雪橇下侧以防攀登时向后滑动）；（尤作爵士乐用语）鼓，鼓面；色情文学作品（或影片）；斯金牌戏（每一位玩牌者有一张牌，各自打赌这张牌不会是第一张与发出的牌配对）; v. 剥皮，削皮；擦破（身体某部位）；（伤口）长出新皮；皮肤愈合；（选手）轻松过球；彻底击败，轻易击败（对手）；骗取（某人的）钱财；制作大麻香烟（skin up）
meaning.en: n. a natural protective body covering and site of the sense of touch; n. the tissue forming the hard outer layer (of e.g. a fruit); n. an outer surface (usually thin); n. body covering of a living animal

meaning.zh: v. 滑倒，失足；滑落，脱落；溜走，悄悄地走；偷偷塞进；滑行，打滑；下降，变差；陷入；迅速穿上，迅速脱下；摆脱，挣脱；飞逝，过得飞快；被（某人）忘记；放出（动物，尤指猎狗）；（身体部分）移位，脱臼；（编织）挑过一针不结；略微松动（汽车离合器）；（动物）流产; n. 疏漏，差错；小纸条；滑，滑倒；滑动；衬裙；（击球员后侧的）守场员；（制陶器用的）泥浆，泥釉；（飞机飞行中的）侧滑；牵狗皮带；（两个码头之间）泊位；（编织）挑针；变糟，下跌；接枝，插枝；瘦小的年轻人; 【名】 （Slip）（芬）斯利普（人名）
meaning.en: A thin, slippery mix of clay and water.

meaning.zh: n. （可投入东西的）狭长孔，狭槽；（在一系列事件中为某事安排的）时间，空档；（组织、团体等中的）位置，职位; v. 把……投入窄孔中，把……放到指定位置；为……安排时间，安置； 与……融洽相处，适应（生活方式）；（足球运动员）准确射门进球；鹿的足迹（slots）; 【名】  （Slot）（英、荷）斯洛特（人名）
meaning.en: n. a position in a grammatical linguistic construction in which a variety of alternative units are interchangeable; n. a small slit (as for inserting a coin or depositing mail); n. a time assigned on a schedule or agenda; n. a position in a hierarchy or organization

meaning.zh: 慢的
meaning.en: not fast

meaning.zh: n. 泥土，土壤；（可供某物发展的）土壤，温床；国土，领土；耕作，务农（the soil）；粪便
meaning.en: n. the state of being covered with unclean things; n. the part of the earth's surface consisting of humus and disintegrated rock; n. material in the top layer of the surface of the earth in which plants can grow (especially with reference to its quality or use); n. the geographical area under the jurisdiction of a sovereign state

meaning.zh: adj. （发炎）疼痛的，酸痛的；恼火的，恼怒的；（精神上）痛苦的，困扰的；极度的，非常的
meaning.en: An injured, infected, inflamed or diseased patch of skin.

meaning.zh: n. 种类，品种；某一种（或某一类）人；（计算机对信息的）分类，排序；程度，方式
meaning.en: A general type.

meaning.zh: n. 灵魂；心灵；某种人；（用于否定句中）一个人（也没有）；灵乐；感受强烈感情的能力；（艺术、音乐作品或文章中的）热情，气魄；精神，精髓；（某地的）人们，人口（souls）；（人类整体的）精神状况，道德品质；（某种品质的）典范，化身；美国黑人文化（或种族尊严）；鬼魂; adj. 激情黑人的，黑人文化的; 【名】 （Soul）（英、法）苏尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. the immaterial part of a person; the actuating cause of an individual life; n. a human being; n. deep feeling or emotion; n. the human embodiment of something

meaning.zh: 酸的
meaning.en: sharp taste

meaning.zh: 星星
meaning.en: celestial body

meaning.zh: 停留
meaning.en: remain

meaning.zh: n. （植物、灌木的）茎，干；（高脚酒杯的）柄脚；（语法中的）词干；烟斗柄；主干；船头，艏柱；（机械装置的）阀杆，导杆，棒；血统；（手表的）发条转柄；（文字的）干线，（音符的）符干；鸦片烟枪; v. 阻止，遏制；止住（液体的流动）；起源于；去梗，去柄；（船）逆流而行；（滑雪）向外转动（滑雪屐）以便转弯（或减速）；给……装柄; abbr. （STEM）理工科的统称（science, technology, engineering, and mathematics）
meaning.en: The stock of a family; a race or generation of progenitors.

meaning.zh: v. 搅拌，搅和（液体等物质）；激发，打动；（情感）逐渐产生，萌发；（使）行动，活动；（使）微动；离开；挑拨，惹是生非; n. 搅动，搅拌；激动（情绪），愤怒（情绪）；微动，颤动；轻微的感觉；监狱
meaning.en: n. a prominent or sensational but short-lived news event; n. emotional agitation and excitement; n. a rapid active commotion; v. move an implement through with a circular motion

meaning.zh: v. 使震惊，使惊讶；使昏迷，（尤指）打昏；给（某人）以深刻印象，使深深感动
meaning.en: The condition of being stunned.

meaning.zh: 拿
meaning.en: get hold of

meaning.zh: n. 故事，传说；（对真人真事精彩的或夸张的）描述，讲述；谎言；流言蜚语
meaning.en: n. a message that tells the particulars of an act or occurrence or course of events; presented in writing or drama or cinema or as a radio or television program; n. a trivial lie

meaning.zh: 谈话
meaning.en: speak with

meaning.zh: n. （储存液体或气体的）箱，罐，缸；一箱，一罐（的量）；坦克；人工蓄水池； （警察局或监狱的）牢房；（养鱼、蛇等用的）玻璃容器，玻璃缸；水柜机车（tank engine 的简称）；紧身背心（多为羊毛的外罩）（tank top 的简称）; v. 彻底失败，破产；故意输掉比赛；给车辆加油； 喝醉； 使惨败；把······贮放在柜（或箱，缸，罐）内；乘车快速行进; 【名】  （Tank）（德、土、阿塞、土库、挪）汤克（人名）
meaning.en: A closed container for liquids or gases.

meaning.zh: n. 磁带，录音带；录了音的盒式磁带，录了像的盒式磁带；胶带，胶布；（用来绑东西或作界限标记的）布条，线带；（赛跑中的）终点线；卷尺; v. （用磁带）录音，录像；用胶带粘贴；用带子系紧； 用（绷带）包扎（受伤部位）; 【名】 （Tape）泰普（人名）
meaning.en: n. a long thin piece of cloth or paper as used for binding or fastening; n. a recording made on magnetic tape; n. the finishing line for a foot race; n. measuring instrument consisting of a narrow strip (cloth or metal) marked in inches or centimeters and used for measuring lengths

meaning.zh: v. 撕碎，撕裂；撕破，划破；撕掉，扯掉；拉伤，撕裂（肌肉或韧带）；狂奔，疾驰；（眼睛）流眼泪；深受……之苦的，饱经……摧残的；（尤指选择或做决定）使折磨，使无法抉择; n. 泪水；哭泣（tears）；裂口，破洞; 【名】 （Tear）蒂尔（人名）
meaning.en: A hole or break caused by tearing.

meaning.zh: n. 十几岁，青少年时期（指从13岁到19岁）；（青）少年，十几岁的孩子；伤害；愤怒；悲哀
meaning.en: A teenager.

meaning.zh: v. 倾向于，往往会；照顾，护理；走向，趋向；招待，照料（商店、酒吧等的顾客）
meaning.en: (Old English law) To make a tender of; to offer or tender.

meaning.zh: n. 帐篷；西班牙红葡萄酒；（外科）塞条，塞子；（医院里给重病病人用的）氧气帐（oxygen tent 的简称）；住处；帷幕; v. 由帐篷组成，用帐篷（或帐篷状物）遮盖；使成帐篷状；（尤指马戏团）住帐篷，在帐篷里宿营；暂时居住
meaning.en: n. a portable shelter (usually of canvas stretched over supporting poles and fastened to the ground with ropes and pegs); v. live in or as if in a tent

meaning.zh: 学期
meaning.en: school period

meaning.zh: adv. 因此；这样，以此种方式；到如此程度
meaning.en: (manner) In this way or manner.

meaning.zh: n. 钩号；一瞬间；（钟表等的）嘀嗒声；壁虱；赊购；（股票）点；一文不值的人，可鄙的人；褥套；（做垫套用的）坚质（条纹）布料（ticking 的简称）; v. （钟或其他机械装置）发出滴答声；打钩，做记号；进展，进步；正常运转；轻触，轻击； （某人的思想、愿望或情感使其）做出……举动，有……的行为; 【名】 （Tick）蒂克（人名）
meaning.en: A tiny woodland arachnid of the suborder Ixodida.

meaning.zh: n. 潮汐；潮水；潮流，趋势；怒潮，（难以控制的）浪潮；高涨的情绪；潮水般的人流，洪流
meaning.en: n. the periodic rise and fall of the sea level under the gravitational pull of the moon; n. something that may increase or decrease (like the tides of the sea); n. there are usually two high and two low tides each day; v. rise or move forward

meaning.zh: n. （贴墙或铺地用的）瓷砖，地砖；（铺屋顶的）瓦，瓦片；（拼字游戏、麻将等牌戏中的）（一张）牌；（棋盘游戏的）棋子；（数）平铺; v. 铺瓦，铺砖；（计算机）平铺（窗口）; 【名】 （Tile）（俄、塞、萨摩）蒂勒（人名）
meaning.en: n. a flat thin rectangular slab (as of fired clay or rubber or linoleum) used to cover surfaces; n. a thin flat slab of fired clay used for roofing; v. cover with tiles

meaning.zh: 收银机
meaning.en: cash register

meaning.zh: adj. 极小的，微小的
meaning.en: A small child; an infant.

meaning.zh: v. （使）感到累，（使）感到疲劳；厌倦，厌烦
meaning.en: To become sleepy or weary.

meaning.zh: v. （轻轻地或随意地）扔，抛，掷；向后甩（头发或身体部位）；（使）摇摆，挥动，颠簸；（在液体中）搅拌（食物），拌匀；（为……）掷硬币决定，掷币猜边儿；把（煎饼）颠起翻面；除掉，抛弃；（马）摔下（骑手）；搜（某地）; n. 掷硬币决定；（轻轻的或随意的）扔，抛，掷；向上甩头，猛仰头；（尤指比赛或游戏中）投掷；根本不在乎; 【名】 （Toss）托斯（姓氏）
meaning.en: n. the act of flipping a coin; n. (sports) the act of throwing the ball to another member of your team; n. an abrupt movement; v. throw or toss with a light motion

meaning.zh: n. 旅行，旅游；游览，参观，观光；巡回比赛（或演出等），巡视；任职期，服役期；（政治家或领导人的）访问；锦标赛（the tour）; v. 旅游，观光，参观；（在……）进行巡回演出; 【名】 （Tour）（瑞典、英）托尔，图尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area; n. a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else); n. a period of time spent in military service; v. make a tour of a certain place

meaning.zh: v. 修剪，修整；削减，减少；修饰，点缀（尤指某物的边缘）；切除，剪掉（不规则或不需要的部分）；调整（船帆）利用风力；使（飞机）配平；调整负载以保持（船，飞机）的平衡；使（身体某一部分）变结实，变瘦；（为个人升迁而在政治上）随大流，见风使舵; n. （尤指毛发的）修剪；额外装饰，边饰，点缀物；汽车装饰（尤指车内座椅铺面或内垫衬料）；（电影剪辑后的）废片；（船在水中的）水平位势；（飞机）配平；良好的状态（或情况）；机翼的位置; adj. 整齐的，整洁美观的；修长的，苗条而健康的; 【名】 （Trim）（美）特里姆（人名）
meaning.en: n. a state of arrangement or appearance; n. a decoration or adornment on a garment; n. attitude of an aircraft in flight when allowed to take its own orientation; n. cutting down to the desired size or shape

meaning.zh: n. 金枪鱼；金枪鱼肉；金武仙人掌；（可食用的）金武扇仙人掌果实
meaning.en: n. tropical American prickly pear of Jamaica; n. important warm-water fatty fish of the genus Thunnus of the family Scombridae; usually served as steaks; n. any very large marine food and game fish of the genus Thunnus; related to mackerel; chiefly of warm waters; n. New Zealand eel

meaning.zh: n. 双胞胎之一，孪生儿之一；两个极相似的事物之一，两个非常相像的人中的一个；（有一对单人床的）双人间；双引擎飞机；孪晶体；双子星座（the Twins）; adj. 双胞胎的，孪生的；成对的，成双的；双重的，相关联的，同时出现的；（镇或市）友好的，姐妹的；（植物）双生的；（卧室）有两张单人床的；（晶体）孪晶的; v. 使结成姐妹城市，使结成友好城市；使（两人或两事物）紧密结合，使相连；生双胞胎; 【名】 （Twin）特温（人名）

meaning.zh: n. 类型，种类；具有某种特征的人，典型；（印刷的）文字，字体；（印刷）铅字，活字；象征；（艺术的）典型，榜样；（宗教学）预兆；（植，动）型，模式标本；（奖章或硬币）图案；（语言学）类型，型; v. （用计算机或打字机）打字；测定……的类型，分型; 【名】 （Type）（英）泰普（人名）

meaning.zh: adj. 自豪的，得意的；令人自豪的；傲慢的，自负的；自尊的，自重的；秀丽的，壮观的；凸出的，隆起的；（肌肉）愈合伤口四周赘生的；（动物）有力量的，精力充沛的; 【名】 （Proud）（英）普劳德（人名）
meaning.en: adj. feeling self-respect or pleasure in something by which you measure your self-worth; or being a reason for pride; adj. having or displaying great dignity or nobility

meaning.zh: v. 证实，证明；证明是，结果是；显示（自己的）才干（或勇气）（prove oneself）； 检验，认证（遗嘱）；（用数学或科学原理）证明，验算；试（枪），查验；（面团）发酵
meaning.en: To proofread.

meaning.zh: 学生
meaning.en: child at school

meaning.zh: n. 小狗，幼犬（=pup）；自负（或傲慢）的年轻人；玩意儿（戏谑语）；人，家伙（戏谑语）
meaning.en: n. a young dog; n. an inexperienced young person

meaning.zh: n. 钱包，皮夹子（尤指女用的）；（女用）手提包，手袋；资金，财源；（体育竞赛中的）奖金
meaning.en: A small bag for carrying money.

meaning.zh: v. （因恐惧、气愤等）发抖，颤抖；（建筑物等）震动，摇晃
meaning.en: A trembling or shaking.

meaning.zh: 队列
meaning.en: waiting line

meaning.zh: adj. 快的，迅速的；（移动，活动）快速的
meaning.en: n. a part of a river where the current is very fast; adj. done or occurring in a brief period of time; adj. characterized by speed; moving with or capable of moving with high speed

meaning.zh: n. 剃（须）刀，刮胡刀；处于险境，境况岌岌可危（on a razor edge）
meaning.en: n. edge tool used in shaving; v. shave with a razor

meaning.zh: v. 到达，抵达；被看见，被听到；达到（特定的水平或数量）；达到（一个特定的时间或阶段）；（经讨论或思考后）达成，实现；伸，伸手；能伸到，能够到；把……递给；（大或长等）足够达到；（用电话等）与……联系；影响，打动；（航海）横风航驶；为……提供帮助（reach out to）; n. （臂的）伸出；伸手可及的距离；可到达的距离；（权力或能力）能及的范围；边远地区；层级，层次；河段，直水道；（特定时期内）观众人数，听众人数；（航海）横风行程; 【名】  (Reach)(柬)列（人名）
meaning.en: The act of stretching or extending; extension.

meaning.zh: v. （作出）反应；起化学反应； (对食物等）不良反应，过敏；（股票价格）回跌
meaning.en: v. show a response or a reaction to something; v. undergo a chemical reaction; react with another substance under certain conditions; v. act against or in opposition to

meaning.zh: v. 重新开始，中止后继续；恢复，重新建立（关系）；使（受到损毁或丢失后）重获新生；更换，更新；重申，重复强调；延长（执照、合同等）的有效期，使续签
meaning.en: v. reestablish on a new, usually improved, basis or make new or like new; v. cause to appear in a new form

meaning.zh: v. 付还，偿还；报答，回报；值得付出（时间、努力等）
meaning.en: To pay back.

meaning.zh: v. 回答，答复；（以行动）作出回应，回击；（在体育比赛中）以得分回应，回敬
meaning.en: A written or spoken response; part of a conversation.

meaning.zh: n. 机器人，自动操作装置；机器般的人；自动交通信号机；（计算机）爬虫程序
meaning.en: n. a mechanism that can move automatically

meaning.zh: adj. （表面）粗糙的，不平的；（网球或软式墙网球拍）粗面的；粗暴的，猛烈的；（地方）多暴力的，犯罪盛行的；汹涌的，风浪很大的；粗制的，不完善的；粗俗的，不讲究的；粗略的，大致的； 艰难的，不愉快的； 身体不适的；（声音）粗哑的，不悦耳的；（酒）涩味的；未经加工的；（文具）用以打草稿的; n. （高尔夫球场的）深草区（the rough）；草稿，草图； 粗野的人，暴徒；未加工的宝石；高低不平的地面；粗糙的部分；艰苦，不愉快; v. 粗制，对……粗加工；草拟，画……的轮廓；使不平，把……弄毛糙； 因陋就简地生活；粗暴地对待；（在美式橄榄球、冰球等比赛中对对手）动粗; adv.  粗糙地，粗暴地； 风餐露宿; 【名】 （Rough）（英）拉夫（人名）
meaning.en: The unmowed part of a golf course.

meaning.zh: adj. 圆形的，球形的；弧形的；微胖的，丰满的；（声音）圆润的；整数的；（钱）大量的；耿直的
meaning.en: n. a charge of ammunition for a single shot; n. an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs; n. a regular route for a sentry or policeman; n. (often plural) a series of professional calls (usually in a set order)

meaning.zh: v. 使惊恐，吓唬；害怕，恐惧
meaning.en: A minor fright.

meaning.zh: adj. 骇人的，恐怖的；异乎寻常的，令人惊奇的；胆小的，易受惊吓的
meaning.en: Causing or able to cause fright.

meaning.zh: v. 责骂，训斥
meaning.en: To burn with hot liquid.

meaning.zh: n. 范围，领域；（发挥能力的）机会，施展余地；视野，眼界；观测仪器（如望远镜、显微镜等）；（船抛锚时的）缆绳长度；特定论点的数量; v. 评估，调查（scope sth. out）；确定（规划项目）的范围；仔细看，彻底检查
meaning.en: The breadth, depth or reach of a subject; a domain.

meaning.zh: 分数
meaning.en: points earned

meaning.zh: v. 抓住，捉住；（用武力）夺取，占领；逮捕，捉拿；没收，扣押；把握（机会等）；（感觉、疼痛）侵袭，控制；吸引（注意力），唤起（想象力）；理解，掌握；意识到，得知（be seized of）；（有活动部件的机器，机器的活动部件）咬住，卡住；依法占有（be seized of）；具有（财产）的终身保有权（be seized of）
meaning.en: To deliberately take hold of; to grab or capture.

meaning.zh: v. 摇动，抖动；削弱，动摇；发抖，哆嗦；握手；使震惊，使烦乱；使改变（态度、信念）；摆脱，克服；舞动（拳头、棍子等）；抖掉，抖出；使劲甩动，急剧晃动；摇头（以示否定）；（声音）颤抖; n. 摇动，摇晃；奶昔；（摇动容器后的）撒出物；哆嗦，颤抖（the shakes）；木制墙面板；地震；（乐）颤音
meaning.en: n. building material used as siding or roofing; n. frothy drink of milk and flavoring and sometimes fruit or ice cream; n. a note that alternates rapidly with another note a semitone above it; n. grasping and shaking a person's hand (as to acknowledge an introduction or to agree on a contract)

meaning.zh: n. 羞耻，羞愧；羞耻心，羞耻感；令人惋惜的事，让人遗憾的事；耻辱，丢脸；带来耻辱的人（或行为、局面）; v. 使感到羞耻（或羞愧）；使蒙羞，使丢脸；使黯然失色，使相形见绌; int. （表示赞叹或喜爱）真可惜，好极了；（用于表示不赞同演讲者所说的话）可耻; 【名】 （Shame）（科特）沙梅（人名）
meaning.en: n. a painful emotion resulting from an awareness of inadequacy or guilt; n. a state of dishonor; n. an unfortunate development; v. bring shame or dishonor upon

meaning.zh: n. 形状，外形；形态，特征；状况，身体状况；健壮；（朦胧的）影像；（事物平常或本来的）样子；有序的排列，条理清楚；伪装，假装；特定形状的东西，模型；身材; vt. 形成，影响；使成形，塑造；计划，思考出；产生（声音，词）；使适合，使符合；（运动员）摆姿势，做动作; 【名】 （Shape）（瑞典）沙佩（人名）
meaning.en: The status or condition of something

meaning.zh: adj. 锋利的，尖的；急转弯的；（变化）急剧的；清晰的，鲜明的；剧烈的，强烈的；（语言）尖锐的；刺耳的；聪明的，敏锐的；（味道）浓烈的，辛辣的；时髦的；（风或霜）刺骨的；狡诈的；（音）偏高（的），升半音（的）；瘦削的，不丰满的; adv. 正点，准时；突然地，急剧地；音调偏高地; n. 升半音，升半音号；锐利的东西；骗子; v. 升音演奏; 【名】 （Sharp）（英）夏普（人名）
meaning.en: n. a musical notation indicating one half step higher than the note named; n. a long thin sewing needle with a sharp point; adj. (of something seen or heard) clearly defined; adj. ending in a sharp point

meaning.zh: v. 剃（须），刮去（毛发）；削去，刮掉（薄层）；（少量地）减去，削减；掠过，擦过
meaning.en: n. the act of removing hair with a razor; v. remove body hair with a razor; v. cut closely; v. cut the price of

meaning.zh: adj. （用于强调）纯粹的，完全的；程度深的，数量大的；陡峭的，垂直的；（织物等）极薄的，透明的
meaning.en: A sheer curtain or fabric.

meaning.zh: n. 床单，被单；布罩，盖布；纸片，纸张；（Excel 中的）工作表；简要记录，纪要；一整版邮票；（尤指大地区系列地图的一部分的）一张地图；薄板，薄片；（冰或水的）一大片；（雨或火）一大片；拉帆绳，帆脚索；敞舱船的首尾区域; v. （用布）盖上，裹上；把（帆）扣紧（或放松）；（雨）倾盆（或瓢泼）而下; 【名】 （Sheet）（英）希特（人名）
meaning.en: n. any broad thin expanse or surface; n. used for writing or printing; n. bed linen consisting of a large rectangular piece of cotton or linen cloth; used in pairs; n. (mathematics) an unbounded two-dimensional shape

meaning.zh: v. （使）移动，（使）转移；（使）转换到（另一个人或另一事物）；（使）改变意见（或信仰等）；赶快；换（挡）；（计算机）移位；按（计算机键盘上的）Shift 键；摆脱，消除；（尤指大量）销售，出售；狼吞虎咽地吃；含糊其辞，拐弯抹角; n. 改变，转变；轮班工作时间；轮班工作的人；（计算机键盘上的）Shift 键；（计算机）移位；（机动车的）换挡装置；宽松直筒连衣裙（=shift dress）；长而宽松的内衣；（建筑）错位；（美橄）（开赛前）球员位置的变换；（天文）（光谱线的）偏移；语音演变（sound shift 的简称）；计谋，诡计
meaning.en: n. an event in which something is displaced without rotation; n. a qualitative change; n. the time period during which you are at work; n. the act of changing one thing or position for another

meaning.zh: adj. 光滑发亮的，有光泽的
meaning.en: Anything shiny; a trinket.

meaning.zh: vi. 叫嚷，大声说；呼叫，喊叫；呼唤，呼喊（以引起注意）；大声吼叫使……住口（或讲话被淹没）（shout sb. down）；将嗓子喊哑； 张扬（shout about）；明确无误地指出（或表示）；（在酒吧、餐厅等）请人喝饮料（或吃东西）；使用大写字母（写电子邮件，表示生气）; n. （愤怒、害怕、激动等的）呼喊，喊叫声； 请客的酒，轮到买酒请客； 紧急召集消防队（或警察）的叫喊声
meaning.en: n. a loud utterance; often in protest or opposition; v. utter in a loud voice; talk in a loud voice (usually denoting characteristic manner of speaking); v. utter a sudden loud cry; v. utter aloud; often with surprise, horror, or joy

meaning.zh: prep. 自……以后，自……以来；（表示气愤）何曾，什么时候
meaning.en: From a specified time in the past.

meaning.zh: n. 溜冰鞋，滑冰鞋； 四轮溜冰鞋，旱冰鞋；（滑冰鞋上的）冰刀；（载笨重物的）滑板车；滑板（skateboard 的简称）；鳐鱼（一种扁平状海鱼）；鳐鱼肉；（南非）声名狼藉的粗鲁白人; v. 滑冰，溜冰；在滑板上滑行，溜出（花样）；滑行；一笔带过，回避（skate over/round）；（喻）一蹴而就（skate through）; 【名】 （Skate）（美、俄、墨）斯卡特（人名）
meaning.en: A light boot, fitted with a blade, used for ice skating.

meaning.zh: 睡觉
meaning.en: rest in bed

meaning.zh: n. 斜坡，斜面；山坡；滑雪斜坡；斜度，坡度；（电子）斜率；扛枪姿势； 东方人（尤指越南人）
meaning.en: An area of ground that tends evenly upward or downward.

meaning.zh: n. 气味；臭味；嗅觉；嗅，闻
meaning.en: n. the sensation that results when olfactory receptors in the nose are stimulated by particular chemicals in gaseous form; n. any property detected by the olfactory system; n. the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people; n. the faculty that enables us to distinguish scents

meaning.zh: 微笑
meaning.en: show happiness

meaning.zh: adj. 固体的，坚硬的；结实的，牢固的；实心的，无空隙的；纯质的；纯色的，单色的；可靠的，可信赖的；一致的，坚定的；不中断的，连续的；相当不错（但谈不上出色或独特）的；立体的，立方的；关系融洽的；严厉的，不公平的；很难的; n.  立体（图形）；固体；固体食物；（液体中的）固形物; 【名】 （Solid）（瑞典）索利德（人名）
meaning.en: n. a substance that is solid at room temperature and pressure; n. the state in which a substance has no tendency to flow under moderate stress; resists forces (such as compression) that tend to deform it; and retains a definite size and shape; n. a three-dimensional shape; adj. of definite shape and volume; firm; neither liquid nor gaseous

meaning.zh: n. （运动）速度；（某事发生或进行的）速度；快，迅速；排挡，变速器；快门速度；感光度；照片曝光的时间；安非他明；成功，繁荣; v. 快速移动；快速运送；超速驾驶；（使）加速，促进；使兴旺发达，帮助成功；用（脱氧麻黄碱之类的）兴奋剂成瘾; 【名】 （Speed）斯皮德（人名）
meaning.en: n. distance travelled per unit time; n. a rate (usually rapid) at which something happens; n. changing location rapidly; n. the ratio of the focal length to the diameter of a (camera) lens system

meaning.zh: n. 香料，调味品；情趣，趣味；赤褐色；糖果；少许
meaning.en: n. aromatic substances of vegetable origin used as a preservative; n. any of a variety of pungent aromatic vegetable substances used for flavoring food; n. the property of being seasoned with spice and so highly flavored; v. make more interesting or flavorful

meaning.zh: 辣的
meaning.en: hot flavor

meaning.zh: v. （使）分裂，（使）产生分歧；（使）分开，分成（不同部分）；（使）撕裂；分担，分享；划破，割破；结束关系，分手；迅速离开；使（原子）产生核裂变；告发，揭发；（头）剧痛; n. 裂口，裂缝；分离，分裂，分歧；分配，份额；区分，不同；劈叉；分开（或切开）的东西；错层式房屋；分段耗时；平局，连续打成平局的比赛; adj. 分裂的
meaning.en: A crack or longitudinal fissure.

meaning.zh: v. 破坏，糟蹋；溺爱，宠坏；善待，格外关照；（食物）变质，腐败；使（选票）作废；极度渴望，跃跃欲试；抢劫（人，地方），掠夺; n. 赃物，战利品（the spoils）；成功所带来的好处（spoils）；（开掘时挖出的）废土，废泥土
meaning.en: n. (usually plural) valuables taken by violence (especially in war); n. the act of spoiling something by causing damage to it; n. the act of stripping and taking by force; v. make a mess of, destroy or ruin

meaning.zh: n. 货摊，贩卖处，咨询台；牲畜棚，马厩，牛棚；（房间内的）小隔间，淋浴室，洗手间；（教堂内）唱诗班和牧师的座位；（剧场的）正厅前排座位（stalls）；（发动机的）熄火，（车辆的）抛锚，（飞机的）失速，（轮船的）停泊；（机动车停车场的）车位；（赛马开始前各马站位的）单间马房; v. （使）熄火，抛锚；故意拖延（以赢得时间）；拖住（某人）；暂缓，搁置，停顿；（飞机）失速；（航海）（由于风力不够而）航行失控；把（牲畜）关在厩内（养肥）; 【名】 （Stall）（美）斯塔尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. a compartment in a stable where a single animal is confined and fed; n. small area set off by walls for special use; n. a booth where articles are displayed for sale; n. a malfunction in the flight of an aircraft in which there is a sudden loss of lift that results in a downward plunge

meaning.zh: v. 凝视，盯着看；瞪眼看，茫然地看；（事物）惹眼，显眼
meaning.en: A persistent gaze.

meaning.zh: n. 蒸汽，水蒸气；水汽，雾气；蒸汽动力（压力）；力量，势头；蒸汽机车
meaning.en: n. water at boiling temperature diffused in the atmosphere; v. travel by means of steam power; v. emit steam; v. rise as vapor

meaning.zh: n. 钢，钢铁；钢铁工业；（用来磨刀的）钢棒；钢制的，钢（铁）的；钢制器具；钢做的部分；兵器；（钢铁般的）坚强，坚定; v. 使坚强地做（或面对）；钢化; adj. 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的; 【名】 （Steel）（德）施特尔，（英）斯蒂尔 （人名）
meaning.en: n. an alloy of iron with small amounts of carbon; widely used in construction; mechanical properties can be varied over a wide range; n. a cutting or thrusting weapon that has a long metal blade and a hilt with a hand guard; n. knife sharpener consisting of a ridged steel rod; v. get ready for something difficult or unpleasant

meaning.zh: adj. （路、山等）陡峭的；（价格，需求）难以接受的，过高的；（增加或减少）急剧的，大幅度的
meaning.en: The steep side of a mountain etc.; a slope or acclivity.

meaning.zh: v. 粘，贴；刺，戳，插；（随便）摆放，放置；伸出，突出；卡住，钉住；容忍，忍受；被接受，被众人采用；（牌戏中）不再要牌；停顿下来，没有进展；（生气地）放弃（和打发）；使支付，导致损失; n. 枯枝，枝条；条状物，棍状物；（用于某特定用途的）棍，条，签；球棍，球棒；变速杆，操纵杆；批评，惩罚；边远地区（the sticks）；（家具的）件；非常瘦的人（或四肢）；画着短细直线的；球门柱（the sticks）；（股票）大宗死股; 【名】 （Stick）（芬）斯蒂克（人名）
meaning.en: n. an implement consisting of a length of wood; n. a small thin branch of a tree; n. a lever used by a pilot to control the ailerons and elevators of an airplane; n. a rectangular quarter pound block of butter or margarine

meaning.zh: n. （干燥的）麦秆，稻草；（喝饮料用的）吸管；稻草色，淡黄色；一文不值的东西
meaning.en: A dried stalk of a cereal plant.

meaning.zh: v. 除去，撕掉（外皮或表层）；夺去，剥夺（地位，权力，财产）；脱衣服，脱光……的衣服；表演脱衣舞；为（奶牛）收奶；拆卸，拆开（机器、车辆或引擎 ）；拆散（汽车等）卖零件；使空无一物，搬光（家具、设备等）；（使）（螺丝或齿轮）受损；（为利润）出售（公司资产）；分离（债券的）息票使二者分开出售；（子弹出膛时因膛面磨损而）不旋转; n. （纸、金属、织物等）条，带；带状地带；（比赛时穿的）队服，球衣；商业街；脱衣舞；连环漫画；（定时播出的）广播节目；飞机跑道; 【名】 （Strip）（俄、美）史地鄱（人名）
meaning.en: A long, thin piece of land; any long, thin area.

meaning.zh: adj. 卡住的，动不了的；被困住，陷入困境；难以继续的，被难倒的；被迫保留，不得不应付；停滞不前的，无所变化的; v. 粘，贴；把……放（某处）；刺，戳，插（stick 的过去式和过去分词形式）; 【名】 （Stuck）斯塔克（人名）
meaning.en: To become or remain attached; to adhere.

meaning.zh: n. 一大群（移动中的昆虫）；（移动着的）一大群人；（多指发生在火山附近的）地震群；（天文）一大群小型天体同时在空中出现; v. （昆虫）成群飞行；（人）蜂涌，涌动；挤满，云集；成群地包围；爬（梯子等），攀
meaning.en: n. a moving crowd; n. a group of many insects; v. be teeming, be abuzz; v. move in large numbers

meaning.zh: v. 咒骂，诅咒；郑重承诺，发誓；保证（所说属实）；使起誓（保密）；（尤指在法庭）宣誓，起誓
meaning.en: To take an oath, to promise.

meaning.zh: v. 流汗，出汗，冒汗；通过出汗排除；（通过运动或费力）使（人，动物）出汗；（食品，物体）渗出水分；辛苦工作，拼命干活；（人）（多指长时间的）处于极度焦虑中； 担心，焦虑，紧张；熔焊（金属）；用文火炖（肉或蔬菜）; n. 汗水，汗液；一身汗，满身大汗； 艰难的工作，累活，繁重的工作； 田径服，运动服，运动裤（sweats）；（用羊毛似的厚棉布做的）宽松休闲服装; 【名】 （Sweat）（美）史维娅特（人名）
meaning.en: n. salty fluid secreted by sweat glands; n. agitation resulting from active worry; n. condensation of moisture on a cold surface; n. use of physical or mental energy; hard work

meaning.zh: v. （身体部位）肿胀，膨胀， 使（某物）膨胀，使肿胀；（使）鼓起，（使）隆起；（使）增长，增加，扩大；（声音）逐渐增强，变响亮；（情绪）高涨，充满；波涛汹涌; n. 海浪的涌动，涌浪；（音量的）增强；感情的高涨；（规模或数量的）增长，增加；（尤指身体部位）凸起的形状，鼓出处，隆起处； 重要人士，时髦人物；（管风琴、簧风琴的）音量调节器; adj.  第一流的，极好的； 漂亮的，时髦的; adv.  极好地，非常顺利地; 【名】 （Swell）（美、英）斯韦尔（人名）
meaning.en: To become bigger, especially due to being engorged.

meaning.zh: n. 剑，刀； 武力，暴力（the sword）；塔罗纸牌中一组牌中的一张（swords）
meaning.en: n. a cutting or thrusting weapon that has a long metal blade and a hilt with a hand guard

meaning.zh: n. 味道，滋味；味觉；爱好，兴趣；（个人）喜欢的事物（tastes）；鉴赏力，品味；体验，尝试；（某段经历造成的）感觉，感受；（用来品尝的）一点儿，少量，一口；（用于短语，表示某人的言行举止等）得当，不得当; v. 尝起来；尝出……的味道；尝，品尝；（短暂地）体验，领略，经历；意识到，感觉到; 【名】 （Taste）（法）塔斯特（人名）
meaning.en: n. the sensation that results when taste buds in the tongue and throat convey information about the chemical composition of a soluble stimulus; n. a strong liking; n. delicate discrimination (especially of aesthetic values); n. a brief experience of something

meaning.zh: adj. 美味的； 有趣的； 性感的，迷人的；善战的
meaning.en: Having a pleasant or satisfying flavor; delicious.

meaning.zh: v. 取笑，嘲笑；逗弄（动物）；（尤指性方面）挑逗，撩拨；哄，逗；拨，分离；梳理（羊毛、头发等）；（为了使头发显厚）回梳; n. 爱开玩笑的人，爱戏弄别人的人；玩笑，戏弄；卖弄风骚的人；激起兴趣的广告
meaning.en: One who teases.

meaning.zh: v. 引诱，诱惑；怂恿，利诱；冒……的风险
meaning.en: v. dispose or incline or entice to; v. provoke someone to do something through (often false or exaggerated) promises or persuasion; v. give rise to a desire by being attractive or inviting; v. induce into action by using one's charm

meaning.zh: adj. 紧张的，焦虑的；（气氛或局势）令人紧张的，引发恐慌的；（身体或肌肉）僵直的，绷紧的；（金属丝等）拉紧的，绷紧的；（语音，尤指元音）紧的; v. （使）（身体或肌肉）绷紧，（使）变得僵直；变得神经紧张; n. （动词的）时态
meaning.en: n. a grammatical category of verbs used to express distinctions of time; v. become stretched or tense or taught; v. increase the tension on; v. become tense, nervous, or uneasy

meaning.zh: n. 偷窃，盗窃；盗窃罪
meaning.en: The act of stealing property.

meaning.zh: n. 拇指；（手套的）拇指部分；（灵长目动物或其他哺乳动物的）第一指；竖起大拇指，翘起大拇指（以表示赞成或说明没问题）；将拇指指向（所谈论的对象）; v. 竖起大拇指请求搭便车；用拇指摸，用拇指捋；用拇指示意；用拇指翻动，翻阅
meaning.en: n. the thick short innermost digit of the forelimb; n. the part of a glove that provides a covering for the thumb; n. a convex molding having a cross section in the form of a quarter of a circle or of an ellipse; v. travel by getting free rides from motorists

meaning.zh: v. 重击，捶击；（心脏）怦怦跳；砰地作响；重步走（或前行），重重（或狠狠）地做；彻底击垮；头痛欲裂
meaning.en: A blow that produces a muffled sound.

meaning.zh: adj. 总的，全部的；完全的，绝对的
meaning.en: An amount obtained by the addition of smaller amounts.

meaning.zh: v. 触摸，碰；接触，触及；损坏，伤害；吃，喝，使用；感动，触动；影响，与……有关；与……媲美，比得上；达到（某一水平等）；参与，涉及；处理，做（某事）；（在脸上）闪现，掠过；轻轻击（球）；具有……特性；向（某人）讨要（物品）；跑垒得分；（几何）与（曲线，表面）切触；（用画笔、铅笔）轻轻勾勒; n. 触觉，触感；触摸，碰；触摸时的感觉；润色，装点；作风，风格，手法；一点儿，少许；略微，稍微；边线以外的区域；触球，控球；（音乐家的）触键法，弹奏法；（乐器键、弦的）弹性，弹力；（钢笔、铅笔等的）轻触；转调较少的钟乐; 【名】 （Touch）（柬）杜（人名）
meaning.en: Primarily physical senses.

meaning.zh: v. 查出，发现，追踪；追溯，追究；描绘（事物的过程或发展），记述；（尤指用手指、脚趾）画（图，线）；勾画……的轮廓，勾勒；（用透明纸覆盖在地图、绘画等上）复制，描摹；（手指、嘴唇等）沿着……移动; n. 痕迹，遗迹，踪迹；微量，少许；描记图，扫描线；挽绳，缰绳；跟踪，追查；（大脑上的学习或记忆）痕迹，印迹；小径，小道；交线，迹线；（数）迹; 【名】 （Trace）（美）塔斯（人名）
meaning.en: An act of tracing.

meaning.zh: n. 痕迹，踪迹；（人或动物的）足迹，嗅迹；（乡间的）小路，小径；（特定）路线，路径；一系列（坏事或有害事件）；（尤指细长）一缕，一串；滑雪坡，滑雪道，越野滑雪路线；电影或广播的预告片；（炮架的）架尾; v. 拖，拉；没精打采地走，拖沓地走；（在竞赛或选举中）落后，输；跟踪，追踪；蔓生，蔓延，被搁置；垂下；慢慢移动，缓缓流动；（声音，喇叭）渐弱；事先宣传，预告（影片，节目等）；喷注（泥釉）; 【名】 （Trail）（美）特雷尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. a track or mark left by something that has passed; n. a path or track roughly blazed through wild or hilly country; n. evidence pointing to a possible solution; v. to lag or linger behind

meaning.zh: n. 垃圾，废物；垃圾桶；劣质的东西，（尤指）拙劣的作品；废物，窝囊废；（西印度）（作燃料的）甘蔗叶（梢），甘蔗渣; v. 损坏，毁坏；抨击，谴责；丢弃，去除；（计算机）把（文件，程序）送进回收站删除，清空（磁盘）；剥（甘蔗）皮以使其更快成熟
meaning.en: Useless things to be discarded; rubbish; refuse.

meaning.zh: v. 对待，看待；治疗，医治；请客，招待；（利用化学物质或反应）处理，保护；把……看作，把……视为；处理，探讨，论述；做使自己快乐的事；把（某物）给某人以示好感；提供（娱乐）；（尤指与对手）商谈，谈判; n. （不同一般的）乐事，享受；款待，招待；请客，做东；甜食；（尤指不经常吃的）美味佳肴; 【名】 （Treat）特里特（人名）
meaning.en: n. something considered choice to eat; n. an occurrence that causes special pleasure or delight; v. interact in a certain way; v. subject to a process or treatment, with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition

meaning.zh: n. 趋势，动态；时尚，风尚；热门话题
meaning.en: An inclination in a particular direction.

meaning.zh: v. 使弯曲；（使）扭曲变形；扭动身体；扭伤（脚踝等）；旋转，转动；编织，捻在一起；缠绕；歪曲，曲解；蜿蜒，曲折；欺诈；牌面朝上; n. 扭动，转动；弯曲处，拐弯处；转折，变化；螺旋形物体；扭摆舞（the twist）；扭歪，（性格）反常；（棉，丝） 合股线；混合酒；欺诈；（棍棒或其他物体） 扭转度；扭转力，转矩；绕轴旋转前进; 【名】 （Twist）（美、英、荷）特威斯特（人名）
meaning.en: A twisting force.

meaning.zh: adj. 不适宜的；不合格的；不健康的
meaning.en: To make unfit; to render unsuitable, spoil, disqualify.

meaning.zh: v. （使）联合，（使）统一；使协调
meaning.en: v. become one; v. to bring or combine together or with something else; v. bring together for a common purpose or action or ideology or in a shared situation; v. act in concert or unite in a common purpose or belief

meaning.zh: n. 工会；联邦，联盟；协会，俱乐部；联合，合并；结婚，婚姻；美利坚合众国（the Union）；（数）并，并集；联管节，接头；（印度次大陆）村落联合体；教区联合济贫组织；旗帜上象征国家统一的部分；混纺织物
meaning.en: The act of uniting or joining two or more things into one.

meaning.zh: v. （使）联合，（使）团结；统一，使统一
meaning.en: v. act in concert or unite in a common purpose or belief; v. become one; v. have or possess in combination; v. be or become joined or united or linked

meaning.zh: conj.  到……时，直到……为止
meaning.en: Up to the time of (something happening).

meaning.zh: adj. 上面的，上层的，较高的；顶部的，上部的；（在机构、体系等中）较高级的，上级的；上游的，北部的；（地质，考古）晚期的，较近期的; n. 鞋面，鞋帮；兴奋剂（尤指安非他明）; 【名】 （Upper）（英）厄珀（人名）
meaning.en: n. the higher of two berths; n. piece of leather or synthetic material that forms the part of a shoe or boot above the sole that encases the foot; n. a central nervous system stimulant that increases energy and decreases appetite; used to treat narcolepsy and some forms of depression; adj. higher in place or position

meaning.zh: n. （词语的）用法；使用，用量；（尤指形成权利，义务，标准等的）常规做法，惯例；虐待，不公待遇
meaning.en: The manner or the amount of using; use.

meaning.zh: adj. 不明确的，不清楚的；（形状）模糊的；（感情、记忆等）不完整的，不清晰的；含糊其词的，闪烁其词的；茫然的，心不在焉的; 【名】 （Vague）韦格（人名）
meaning.en: A wandering; a vagary.

meaning.zh: n. 病毒；病毒性疾病，病毒感染；（计算机）病毒，（手机的）短信病毒；有害影响，毒害；毒液
meaning.en: n. (virology) ultramicroscopic infectious agent that replicates itself only within cells of living hosts; many are pathogenic; a piece of nucleic acid (DNA or RNA) wrapped in a thin coat of protein; n. a harmful or corrupting agency; n. a software program capable of reproducing itself and usually capable of causing great harm to files or other programs on the same computer

meaning.zh: adj. 生动的，逼真的；（颜色）鲜艳的，明亮的；（人的想像）丰富的
meaning.en: A felt-tipped permanent marker.

meaning.zh: n.  元音，母音；元音字母，母音字母
meaning.en: n. a speech sound made with the vocal tract open; n. a letter of the alphabet standing for a spoken vowel

meaning.zh: n. （一般由马拉的）四轮运货车；（无顶的）铁路货车车厢，车皮；旅行轿车（station wagon 的简称）；（用作食品货摊的）手推车；儿童玩具小车；（吉卜赛人或马戏团用的）大篷车；令人不快的女人; v. 用运货马车运输货物; 【名】 （Wagon）（法、德）瓦贡（人名）
meaning.en: A four-wheeled cart for hauling loads.

meaning.zh: n. 浪费，滥用；废物，废弃物（同 wastes）；荒地，荒原（wastes）；（尤指因租借人的行为或疏忽而导致的）不动产的损坏，产业损伤；粪便，尿液; v. 浪费，滥用；未能充分利用，没有物尽其用；杀害，谋杀（某人）；（使）（人，身体部位）逐渐变虚弱，变消瘦；破坏，毁坏（地方）；（时间）流逝，被花掉; adj. （通常指城市中的某地）荒芜的，荒废的；（材料、物质等）废弃的，无用的
meaning.en: n. any materials unused and rejected as worthless or unwanted; n. useless or profitless activity; using or expending or consuming thoughtlessly or carelessly; n. the trait of wasting resources; n. an uninhabited wilderness that is worthless for cultivation

meaning.zh: adj. 奇怪的，不寻常的；怪异的，超自然的
meaning.en: Fate; destiny; luck.

meaning.zh: n. 鲸；巨大的东西
meaning.en: n. a very large person; impressive in size or qualities; n. any of the larger cetacean mammals having a streamlined body and breathing through a blowhole on the head; v. hunt for whales

meaning.zh: conj. 当……的时候；与……同时；而，然而（表示对比）；尽管，虽然；直到……为止
meaning.en: An uncertain duration of time, a period of time.

meaning.zh: adj. 全部的，整个的；完整的，完好无损的；(强调大小或重要性）整个的，全部的；要点，主旨；健全的，健康的; n. 整体，全部; adv. 完全地；整个
meaning.en: Something complete, without any parts missing.

meaning.zh: adj. 最差的，最糟的，最严重的
meaning.en: Unfavorable; negative; not good.

meaning.zh: adj. 价值……的，值……钱的；值得的，具有……价值的；拥有……财产的；（尤指合同）毫无价值的
meaning.en: Value.

meaning.zh: n. （刀、枪或其他武器所致的）创伤，伤口；（感情或名誉的）损害，痛苦
meaning.en: n. any break in the skin or an organ caused by violence or surgical incision; n. a casualty to military personnel resulting from combat; n. a figurative injury (to your feelings or pride); n. the act of inflicting a wound

meaning.zh: n. 手腕，腕关节；（四足动物前腿的）膝关节，（鸟翅膀的）腕；袖口，腕部；（机器的）曲柄销，肘节销
meaning.en: n. a joint between the distal end of the radius and the proximal row of carpal bones

meaning.zh: adv. 在（船、飞机、火车等）上；上（船、飞机、火车等）；骑在（马）上，跨上（马）；（棒球）在垒上；加入，加盟; prep. 在（船、飞机、火车等）上；上（船、飞机、火车等）；骑在（马）上
meaning.en: adv. on a ship, train, plane or other vehicle; adv. on first or second or third base; adv. side by side; adv. part of a group

meaning.zh: 缺席的
meaning.en: not present

meaning.zh: 吸收
meaning.en: to take in

meaning.zh: 口音
meaning.en: pronunciation

meaning.zh: 访问
meaning.en: entry

meaning.zh: 指控
meaning.en: charge with wrongdoing

meaning.zh: 活跃的
meaning.en: energetic

meaning.zh: n. 副词
meaning.en: n. the word class that qualifies verbs or clauses; n. a word that modifies something other than a noun

meaning.zh: n. 广告
meaning.en: An advertisement, an ad.

meaning.zh: 影响
meaning.en: have effect on

meaning.zh: 负担得起
meaning.en: to have money for

meaning.zh: 议程
meaning.en: list of items

meaning.zh: adj. 惊奇的，惊讶的
meaning.en: adj. filled with the emotional impact of overwhelming surprise or shock

meaning.zh: 数量
meaning.en: quantity

meaning.zh: 年度的
meaning.en: happening every year

meaning.zh: adv. 不管怎样，无论如何；无关紧要；至少；接着；总之；随便地，杂乱无章地
meaning.en: (manner) In any way or manner whatever.

meaning.zh: 呼吁
meaning.en: to request

meaning.zh: v. 逮捕，拘留；阻止，抑制；吸引；心跳停止
meaning.en: A check, stop, an act or instance of arresting something.

meaning.zh: 艺术家
meaning.en: creative person

meaning.zh: 方面
meaning.en: particular feature

meaning.zh: 分配
meaning.en: give task to

meaning.zh: 协助
meaning.en: help or support

meaning.zh: 假设
meaning.en: take for granted

meaning.zh: adj. 原子的，与原子有关的；原子能的，核能的
meaning.en: An atomic operation.

meaning.zh: 附上
meaning.en: fasten or join

meaning.zh: 获得
meaning.en: to achieve

meaning.zh: 参加
meaning.en: be present

meaning.zh: 途径
meaning.en: way of approach

meaning.zh: adv. 仅仅，只（用于强调某物小或微不足道）；无非是……，不过是……（指某事的原因或影响）
meaning.en: Wholly, entirely.

meaning.zh: n. 痛苦，苦难；穷困，悲惨境遇；老发牢骚的人
meaning.en: n. a state of ill-being due to affliction or misfortune; n. a feeling of intense unhappiness

meaning.zh: v. 修改，改进；修饰，限定；缓和，使温和；使改形，使转化；变（音）
meaning.en: To change part of.

meaning.zh: n. 动机，目的，原因；（文艺作品、音乐的）艺术思想，主题
meaning.en: n. the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior; n. a theme that is elaborated on in a piece of music; adj. causing or able to cause motion; adj. impelling to action

meaning.zh: n. 谋杀，凶杀；困难的事，讨厌的事；一群乌鸦
meaning.en: n. unlawful premeditated killing of a human being by a human being; v. kill intentionally and with premeditation; v. alter so as to make unrecognizable

meaning.zh: n. 肌肉；体力，力气；权力，影响力；身强力壮的男子（们）
meaning.en: n. one of the contractile organs of the body; n. animal tissue consisting predominantly of contractile cells; n. a bully employed as a thug or bodyguard; n. authority or power or force (especially when used in a coercive way)

meaning.zh: adj. 相互的，彼此的；共同的，共有的；（保险公司、建筑协会等）互助的
meaning.en: A mutual fund.

meaning.zh: adj. 狭窄的，狭小的；（想法、态度或信仰）狭隘的；勉强的，（成败）差距很小的；（种类或数目）有限的，范围小的；严格的，精确的；（标音）严式的；（语音）窄的; v. （人的眼睛）眯起来；使缩小，压缩；使变窄，变窄; n. 海峡；狭窄部分
meaning.en: n. a narrow strait connecting two bodies of water; v. make or become more narrow or restricted; v. define clearly; v. become more special

meaning.zh: adj. 附近的
meaning.en: Adjacent, near, close by

meaning.zh: n. 花蜜；果汁；（希腊罗马诸神饮用的）神酒，琼浆；甘美的饮料
meaning.en: The drink of the gods.

meaning.zh: n. 缝衣针；编织针；注射针；（针灸疗法用的）刺针；唱针；（仪器上的）指针；针叶；（尤指竞争所引发的）针锋相对，敌意；气针；（蚀刻中的）刻针；撞针；尖岩，尖顶；撑木；方尖塔; 【名】 （Needle）（英）尼德尔（人名）; v. 刺激，（尤指）不断地数落；用针穿刺（某物），像针一样地刺（某物）；用针缝；缝纫，做针线
meaning.en: n. as the leaf of a conifer; n. a slender pointer for indicating the reading on the scale of a measuring instrument; n. a sharp pointed implement (usually steel); n. a stylus that formerly made sound by following a groove in a phonograph record

meaning.zh: n. 侄子，外甥
meaning.en: n. a son of your brother or sister

meaning.zh: n. 注意，察觉；通告，布告；公告牌，警示牌；通知；事先声明，警告；预先通知期；剧评，书评；辞职信，搬迁通知；（报纸、杂志上的）小型广告，简短通告；警告书，说明书; v. 意识，注意；留意；正式通知；简评；客气对待；提到，谈到
meaning.en: The act of observing; perception.

meaning.zh: n. 概念，想法；缝纫用品；一时的念头，突发的奇想
meaning.en: n. a vague idea in which some confidence is placed; n. a general inclusive concept; n. an odd or fanciful or capricious idea; n. (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items

meaning.zh: n. 物体，实物；目的，目标；宾语；（引发某种情感或行为的）对象；客体；（计算机）对象
meaning.en: A thing that has physical existence.

meaning.zh: v. （尤指通过艰难的过程）得到，获得；（规则或情况）存在，通用
meaning.en: v. come into possession of; v. receive a specified treatment (abstract); v. be valid, applicable, or true

meaning.zh: v. 使用（房屋、建筑），居住；占据（空间，时间）；使忙于（做某事）；使一直在想；（军事）占领，占据；（尤指为表示抗议而）非法强占（建筑物）；任职，位居

meaning.zh: n. 可选择的事物；选择，选择权；（将来的）买卖选择权利，期权；（计算机程序中的）选项；选修课；（购买新设备，尤其是汽车时提供的）附件，配件; v. 买卖（某物的）期权
meaning.en: One of a set of choices that can be made.

meaning.zh: n. 起源，起因；出身，血统；（原）产地；肌肉起端；神经（或血管）起端；（数）原点
meaning.en: The beginning of something.

meaning.zh: n. 不法之徒，逃犯；被剥夺法律权益和保护者

meaning.zh: n. 氧，氧气
meaning.en: n. a nonmetallic bivalent element that is normally a colorless odorless tasteless nonflammable diatomic gas; constitutes 21 percent of the atmosphere by volume; the most abundant element in the earth's crust

meaning.zh: n. （小船的）短桨，桨；桨状工具，桨状物；划桨；（乒乓球的）球拍；扁条刑杖；（明轮船驱动所用的）轮叶，明轮翼；赤脚涉水，蹚水；（飞船上伸出的）太阳能电池板；（心脏起搏用的）电极棒；鳍状前肢; v. 用桨划（船）；在……上划船；蹚水，赤足涉水；（游泳时快速）拨水；用戒尺打（孩子）；搅拌，混合
meaning.en: n. small wooden bat with a flat surface; used for hitting balls in various games; n. a blade of a paddle wheel or water wheel; n. an instrument of punishment consisting of a flat board; n. a short light oar used without an oarlock to propel a canoe or small boat

meaning.zh: n. 包裹，邮包；一批，一群；一块土地（尤指地产的一部分）；有馅料的食品（通常指油酥点心）

meaning.zh: n. 赦免；宽恕，原谅；（中世纪欧洲出售的）赎罪券，赦罪符

meaning.zh: n. 鹦鹉；学舌者，机械模仿别人的人
meaning.en: n. usually brightly colored zygodactyl tropical birds with short hooked beaks and the ability to mimic sounds; n. a copycat who does not understand the words or acts being imitated; v. repeat mindlessly

meaning.zh:
n. 巡逻，巡查；巡逻队，巡逻车；童子军小队；
（儿童穿越马路处的）交通管理员
meaning.en: n. a detachment used for security or reconnaissance; n. the activity of going around or through an area at regular intervals for security purposes; n. a group that goes through a region at regular intervals for the purpose of security; v. maintain the security of by carrying out a control

meaning.zh: n. 花生，花生米；很少的钱（peanuts）；小片聚苯乙烯泡沫塑料（peanuts）
meaning.en: n. underground pod of the peanut vine; n. widely cultivated American plant cultivated in tropical and warm regions; showy yellow flowers on stalks that bend over to the soil so that seed pods ripen underground; n. a young child who is small for his age; n. pod of the peanut vine containing usually 2 nuts or seeds; `groundnut' and `monkey nut' are British terms

meaning.zh: v. 批准，许可；（使）成为可能；破例做，放纵
meaning.en: n. a legal document giving official permission to do something; n. the act of giving a formal (usually written) authorization; n. large game fish; found in waters of the West Indies; v. consent to, give permission

meaning.zh: n. 短语，词组；惯用语，习语；乐句；（芭蕾）舞句
meaning.en: A short written or spoken expression.

meaning.zh: 枕头
meaning.en: head support

meaning.zh: 请
meaning.en: polite request

meaning.zh: n. 富裕，充裕
meaning.en: A more-than-adequate amount.

meaning.zh: n. 诗歌；诗一般的美丽，诗的意境；（学校或大学里的）诗歌课
meaning.en: n. literature in metrical form; n. any communication resembling poetry in beauty or the evocation of feeling

meaning.zh: n. 毒药；有害的思想；恶毒的言辞（或行动）；（化）抑制剂；（物理）中子吸收剂

meaning.zh: n. 政策，方针；(处事) 原则，策略；保险单
meaning.en: n. a line of argument rationalizing the course of action of a government; n. a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group; n. written contract or certificate of insurance

meaning.zh: n. 粉，粉末；扑面粉，美容粉；细雪，粉状雪；火药，炸药

meaning.zh: v. （尤指公开地）赞美，表扬；（用语言或音乐）赞美（上帝）
meaning.en: Commendation; favourable representation in words

meaning.zh: n. 祷文，祷词；祈祷，祷告；祈祷仪式，祈祷会（prayers）；愿望，祈望；极小的机会，极小的可能性

meaning.zh: n. 前缀；前置代号（置于前面的单词或字母、数字）； （人名前的）称谓
meaning.en: Something placed before another

meaning.zh: n. 牧师，神职人员；木渔槌（垂钓时用以打死已上钩的鱼）
meaning.en: n. a clergyman in Christian churches who has the authority to perform or administer various religious rites; one of the Holy Orders; n. a person who performs religious duties and ceremonies in a non-Christian religion

meaning.zh: n. 监狱，牢房；监禁，监狱制度；难以脱身的地方（或处境），牢笼

meaning.zh: adj. 公众的，大众的；公共的，公用的；政府的，公众事务的； 大学的，为大学的；（声明、事件等）公开的，公诸于众的；公开场合的，大庭广众的；上市的；众所周知的，广为人知的; n. 公众，大众（the public）；志趣相投（或从事同一类活动、具有共同特征）的群体；（对某个艺术家、作家或表演家感兴趣的）读者，观众（one's public）；（酒馆中的）低价吧台（=public bar），酒吧（=public house）；公共场所; 【名】  （Public）（英）帕布利克（人名）

meaning.zh: v. 处罚，惩罚（做错事或犯法的人）；惩处（犯罪行为）；（尤指体育运动中）利用（对手的失误）；粗暴地对待；使遭受严重打击；自责； 贪婪地吃喝；施加惩罚

meaning.zh: v. 使困惑，使迷惑；（因迷惑而）苦思，冥思苦想；（通过苦苦思索）解决（或弄清楚），理出头绪（puzzle sth. out）; n. 测验智力（或知识）的游戏（或玩具，问题）；拼图游戏，拼图玩具；令人费解的人（或事物），难题

meaning.zh: adj. 种族关系的，种族之间的；人种的，种族的

meaning.zh: adv. 罕有，很少；异乎寻常地，极度

meaning.zh: n. 配给量，定量；（尤指发给作战士兵的）口粮配给，口粮定量；合理（正常）的量；粮食供应，食物储备；应得之量; v. 对（供应品）定量供应，实行配给；对（某人）实行定量供给，配给
meaning.en: n. the food allowance for one day (especially for service personnel); n. a fixed portion that is allotted (especially in times of scarcity); v. restrict the consumption of a relatively scarce commodity, as during war; v. distribute in rations, as in the army

meaning.zh: v. 记起，回想起；使想起，使想到；召回，叫回（某人）；召回（运动员），使归队； 收回（有问题的产品）；检索，调用（计算机储存的数据）； 罢免；使重新集中注意力； 撤销，废止（行动，决定）; n. 记忆力，记性；召回；（因产品有问题的）收回；（将运动员的）召回归队；（请愿后经投票对政府官员的）罢免；回索率，检索率；撤销

meaning.zh: v. 背诵，朗诵；详述，列举
meaning.en: v. recite in elocution; v. repeat aloud from memory; v. render verbally,; v. narrate or give a detailed account of

meaning.zh: 录制
meaning.en: capture

meaning.zh: v. 减少，降低；（烹调中）使变浓稠，收汁；节食减肥；使沦为，使陷入（不好的境地）；迫使，使不得不（做）；（通过破裂、燃烧等）使变成，使化为；归纳，简化；将分数约到（最小项）；（使）进行还原反应；减薄（底片或图片）；（语音）弱化；使（脱臼，断骨）复位；攻克，征服（尤指围攻并占领城镇或要塞）

meaning.zh: 退款
meaning.en: money returned

meaning.zh: v. 拒绝，回绝（做某事）；不接受，拒绝（别人给的东西）；拒绝给（所需之物）；（物体）未应要求起作用； 不接受（某人的）求婚；（马）拒绝（跨栏或其他障碍物）; n.  垃圾，废弃物; adj.  废弃的
meaning.en: n. food that is discarded (as from a kitchen); v. show unwillingness towards; v. refuse to accept; v. elude, especially in a baffling way

meaning.zh: v. 重新获得，恢复；重回，回到（某处）
meaning.en: To get back; to recover possession of.

meaning.zh: v. 认为，把……看作；（尤指以某种方式）注视，凝视；注意，留心；与……有关，涉及

meaning.zh: n. 地区，区域；行政区；（首都以外的）地方（the regions）；身体部位；领域，界
meaning.en: n. the extended spatial location of something; n. a part of an animal that has a special function or is supplied by a given artery or nerve; n. a large indefinite location on the surface of the Earth; n. the approximate amount of something (usually used prepositionally as in `in the region of')

meaning.zh: v. 拒绝，否决（提议、建议或请求）；摈弃，不接受（信仰或政治制度）；不雇用，不录取；（因质量不好而）废弃；冷落，嫌弃；排异，排斥（移植器官）；（投币设备）拒绝接受（硬币）; n. 次品，废品；不合格者，被排斥者
meaning.en: Something that is rejected.

meaning.zh: v. 联系，使有联系；涉及，关于；叙述，讲述；认同，理解；相处，交往（描述人们如何交谈、相处和对待他人）

meaning.zh: n. 言论，评述；（正式演讲时的）言论（remarks）； 引人注目，显耀
meaning.en: An act of pointing out or noticing; notice or observation.

meaning.zh: n. 解决方法，纠正方法；法定补偿（办法）；治疗（法），药品；（硬币的）公差
meaning.en: Something that corrects or counteracts.

meaning.zh: vt. 移开，拿开；除去，废除；把……免职，开除；脱下，摘下； 依法迫迁；远离；不同于，迥异于； 搬家; n.  距离，间距；（一些英国学校中的）年级
meaning.en: The act of removing something.

meaning.zh: 报告
meaning.en: written account

meaning.zh: v.  营救，援救；拯救，挽救（生意等）；防止……丢失（或遭丢弃），取回
meaning.en: An act or episode of rescuing, saving.

meaning.zh: v. 阻挡，抵制；抵抗，回击；耐得住，抵挡；使不受……的伤害，抗（伤害）
meaning.en: A protective coating or covering.

meaning.zh: n. 旅游胜地，度假胜地；求助的方法，采用的手段；采用，诉诸，求助
meaning.en: n. a hotel located in a resort area; n. a frequently visited place; n. something or someone turned to for assistance or security; n. act of turning to for assistance

meaning.zh: 结果
meaning.en: outcome

meaning.zh: n. 零售
meaning.en: n. the selling of goods to consumers; usually in small quantities and not for resale; v. be sold at the retail level; v. sell on the retail market; adj. selling or related to selling direct to the consumer

meaning.zh: v. 保持，保留；保存，储存；记住；付定金聘定（尤指律师）；留用（员工）
meaning.en: To keep in possession or use.

meaning.zh: v. （以不同的方式）复述，重新讲述
meaning.en: v. render verbally,; v. make into fiction; v. to say, state, or perform again

meaning.zh: 复习
meaning.en: review for exam

meaning.zh: n. 奖励，回报；赏格，悬赏金；报偿，报应
meaning.en: Something of value given in return for an act.

meaning.zh: n. 谜语；谜一般的人（或事）；（筛分土石的）粗筛
meaning.en: n. a difficult problem; n. a coarse sieve (as for gravel); v. pierce with many holes; v. set a difficult problem or riddle

meaning.zh: adj. 腐烂的，发臭的；（道德、社会或政治）腐败的，堕落的；令人不快的，讨厌的；质量差的，水平低的；（人）不友善的，不诚实的；身体不适的，有病的；感到内疚（或惭愧）的；  （强调非常生气或沮丧）倒霉的，破烂的; adv.  非常；恶劣地，糟糕地; 【名】 （Rotten）（法、德）罗滕（人名）
meaning.en: adj. very bad; adj. having or disintegrated; usually implies foulness; adj. damaged by decay; hence unsound and useless

meaning.zh: n. 橡胶，合成橡胶； 橡皮擦； 黑板擦； 避孕套； 橡胶套鞋；（桥牌或板球的）一盘，决胜局；（棒球比赛中投手站的）投手板；多轮决胜负的比赛（如三局两胜）; adj. 橡胶制成的; v. 扭转脖子看，好奇地引颈而望; 【名】 （Rubber）（西鲁）韦尔（人名）
meaning.en: n. an elastic material obtained from the latex sap of trees (especially trees of the genera Hevea and Ficus) that can be vulcanized and finished into a variety of products; n. any of various synthetic elastic materials whose properties resemble natural rubber; n. an eraser made of rubber (or of a synthetic material with properties similar to rubber); commonly mounted at one end of a pencil; n. contraceptive device consisting of a sheath of thin rubber or latex that is worn over the penis during intercourse

meaning.zh: adv. 无礼地；粗暴地
meaning.en: In a rude manner

meaning.zh: n. （机场的）跑道；（时装模特表演时走的）伸展台，T型台；（尤指小体哺乳动物在草地或雪地下等挖的）过道，通道；（运原木的）滑道，滑运斜面
meaning.en: n. a narrow platform extending from the stage into the audience in a theater or nightclub etc.; n. a strip of level paved surface where planes can take off and land

meaning.zh: adj. 神的，神圣的；宗教的，宗教性的；受尊重的，受崇敬的；不可侵犯的，不容干涉的
meaning.en: adj. concerned with religion or religious purposes; adj. worthy of respect or dedication; adj. made or declared or believed to be holy; devoted to a deity or some religious ceremony or use; adj. worthy of religious veneration

meaning.zh: n. （尤指在东非的）观兽旅行，游猎；长途旅行，旅游期间，外出期间
meaning.en: n. an overland journey by hunters (especially in Africa)

meaning.zh: adv. 安全地
meaning.en: adv. with safety; in a safe manner

meaning.zh: n. 安全；安全性；安全场所，安全的地方；安全方法，安全措施； （枪炮的）保险栓，保险机（=safety catch ）；安全分（持球进攻队员在己方端线后被拦截，防守方得两分）；（位置远离争球线的）安全卫； 安全套；（棒球）安打；安全设备; adj. （特征、措施）保障安全的
meaning.en: The condition or feeling of being safe; security; certainty.

meaning.zh: n. 鲑鱼，三文鱼，大麻哈鱼；鲑鱼肉，三文鱼肉；鲑肉粉红色，浅橙色；类似鲑的鱼，尤指澳鲑，石首鱼
meaning.en: n. any of various large food and game fishes of northern waters; usually migrate from salt to fresh water to spawn; n. a tributary of the Snake River in Idaho; n. flesh of any of various marine or freshwater fish of the family Salmonidae; adj. of orange tinged with pink

meaning.zh: n. 凉鞋；檀香，檀香木（sandalwood 的简称）；便鞋
meaning.en: n. a shoe consisting of a sole fastened by straps to the foot

meaning.zh: n. 茶碟，茶托，碟状物
meaning.en: A small shallow dish to hold a cup and catch drips.

meaning.zh: adj. 惊恐的，恐惧的；担心的，焦虑的
meaning.en: To frighten, terrify, startle, especially in a minor way.

meaning.zh: adj. 风景优美的；观光的；舞台布景的；（画）描绘事件的
meaning.en: A depiction of scenery

meaning.zh: v. （因伤痛、害怕、激动等）尖叫；（向某人或为某事）高声喊，大声叫；发出尖锐的响声；呼啸而过；（使）醒目，（使）触目惊心（=scream out）；呼吁，抗议；清晰地表明；颜色不相配; n. （因疼痛、惊恐、兴奋等发出的）尖叫声；（动物的）高声尖叫；尖锐刺耳的声音；极其滑稽可笑的人（或事物、场面）
meaning.en: n. sharp piercing cry; n. a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry; n. a joke that seems extremely funny; v. utter a sudden loud cry

meaning.zh: 搜索
meaning.en: look for

meaning.zh: 季节
meaning.en: time of year

meaning.zh: 第二
meaning.en: after first

meaning.zh: adj. 秘密的，保密的；（感情、担心、行动）不公开的，暗自的；（某人的行为）诡秘的，神秘的；善于掩饰自己的，严守秘密的; n. 秘密，内情；神秘，奥秘；秘诀，诀窍；（罗马天主教弥撒捐献仪式后牧师的）默祷; 【名】 （Secret）（法）塞克雷（人名）
meaning.en: n. something that should remain hidden from others (especially information that is not to be passed on); n. information known only to a special group; n. something that baffles understanding and cannot be explained; adj. not open or public; kept private or not revealed

meaning.zh: adj. 稳固的，可靠的；严密把守的，牢固的；安全的，稳妥的；（对自己和自己的能力）有自信的；感到有保障的，没有顾虑的；固定住的，系牢的；秘密的; v. （尤指经过努力而）获得，得到；使安全，保护；缚牢，将（某物）固定；确保，保证；为（债务或贷款）作抵押，作保；（外科）压迫（血管）止血；停止工作；船抛锚
meaning.en: v. get by special effort; v. cause to be firmly attached; v. assure payment of; v. make certain of

meaning.zh: v. 选择，挑选；（在计算机屏幕上）选定；（进化）决定（特征，生物）是否继续存在
meaning.en: v. pick out, select, or choose from a number of alternatives; adj. of superior grade; adj. selected or chosen for special qualifications

meaning.zh: n. 连续，一系列（事件）；（电视、广播等的）系列片，系列节目；丛书，系列出版物；（两队之间的）系列比赛；（电路的）串联；（同时发行的）一套邮票（或货币、硬币）；（由某一公司推出的）系列产品，（尤指）汽车系列；（年代地层学用语）统；（元素的）系；级数，序列项的总和；有共同特征的一组语音，系列（音）；音列
meaning.en: n. similar things placed in order or happening one after another; n. a serialized set of programs; n. a periodical that appears at scheduled times; n. (sports) several contests played successively by the same teams

meaning.zh: n. 服务器；服务生，服务员；上餐用具；发球者；（基督教牧师做礼拜时的）助祭
meaning.en: n. a person whose occupation is to serve at table (as in a restaurant); n. (court games) the player who serves to start a point; n. (computer science) a computer that provides client stations with access to files and printers as shared resources to a computer network; n. utensil used in serving food or drink

meaning.zh: v. 解决，结束（争端等）；确定，决定；定居，安家；殖民，移居于；安置，安顿；（使）平静，（使）安定；降落，停留；（使）沉降，下陷；付清，结算；处理，分配（财产）；笼罩，稳定下来；把......放好，安放；（无可奈何地）接受（或答应）; n. 高背扶手木长椅; 【名】 （Settle）（英）塞特尔（人名）
meaning.en: To conclude or resolve (something):

meaning.zh: adj. 十分严重的，极为恶劣的；艰巨的，严峻的；（惩罚、批评）严厉的，重的；严厉的，苛刻的；不加装饰的，朴素的
meaning.en: Very bad or intense.

meaning.zh: 影子
meaning.en: dark area

meaning.zh: v. （因寒冷或害怕而）颤抖，哆嗦，发抖
meaning.en: The act of shivering.

meaning.zh: n. 虾，小虾； 矮子，无足轻重的人
meaning.en: n. disparaging terms for small people; n. any of various edible decapod crustaceans; n. small slender-bodied chiefly marine decapod crustaceans with a long tail and single pair of pincers; many species are edible; v. fish for shrimp

meaning.zh: 信号
meaning.en: transmission

meaning.zh: adj. （人）安静的，沉默的；沉默寡言的，不爱说话的；（事物）无声的，寂静的；（情感、行为等）不用言语表达的，默默的；只字不提的，不愿讲的；（电影）无声的；（字母）不发音的；（疾病或问题等）悄然的，无症状的
meaning.en: That which is silent; a time of silence.

meaning.zh: adj. 单一的，单个的；单身的，未婚的；各自的，分别的；单人的，单人用的；（票）单程的；统一的；由一个部分构成的；（花）单瓣的；唯一的；（酒的）一份; n. 单曲唱片；（板球中的）一分打，（棒球中的）一垒打；单身者，未婚者； 单程票；（旅馆等的）单人房间；单打（比赛）； 一元纸币；（鸣钟术）不同次序鸣钟法；（影剧院的）一张票，一个座位；一份酒; v. 挑选，选出；（棒球）击出一垒打；对（幼苗，幼树）进行间苗；将（铁轨）变成单线；以一垒打使（跑垒）得分
meaning.en: n. a base hit on which the batter stops safely at first base; n. the smallest whole number or a numeral representing this number; v. hit a single; adj. being or characteristic of a single thing or person

meaning.zh: n. 袖子；袖套；（机器的）套筒，套管；唱片套；风向袋；（机尾的）减速伞，制动伞
meaning.en: The part of a garment that covers the arm.

meaning.zh: adj. 轻微的，少量的；（人）瘦小的，纤弱的；（尤指创作）不深奥的，不重要的
meaning.en: n. a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval); v. pay no attention to, disrespect; adj. having little substance or significance; adj. almost no or (with `a') at least some; very little

meaning.zh: n. 口号，标语；广告语；苏格兰高地的战斗呐喊
meaning.en: n. a favorite saying of a sect or political group

meaning.zh: n. 吸烟者；薰制工
meaning.en: A person who smokes tobacco habitually.

meaning.zh: v. 打喷嚏
meaning.en: An act of sneezing.

meaning.zh: v. 使平静，安抚；减轻，缓和（疼痛）
meaning.en: v. give moral or emotional strength to; v. cause to feel better

meaning.zh: n. 悲伤，悲痛，悲哀；伤心事
meaning.en: Unhappiness, woe

meaning.zh: n. （活动、兴趣、专业知识的）范围，领域；球体，球，球形；社会阶层；势力范围；苍穹，天，天空；天体；天体外壳；地球仪; vt. 使……成球形；包围；放入球内
meaning.en: n. a particular environment or walk of life; n. any spherically shaped artifact; n. the geographical area in which one nation is very influential; n. a particular aspect of life or activity

meaning.zh: n. 蜘蛛；（搜索引擎的）蜘蛛程序，（计算机）爬虫程序；状似蜘蛛的物体；蛛网形系索；台球棒三脚架；设圈套者; v. （似蜘蛛般）急促爬动；设网，设圈套；（在因特网上）快速搜索（crawl 的别名）
meaning.en: n. predatory arachnid that usually has silk-spinning organs at the back end of the body; they spin silk to make cocoons for eggs or traps for prey; n. a computer program that prowls the internet looking for publicly accessible resources that can be added to a database; the database can then be searched with a search engine; n. a skillet made of cast iron

meaning.zh: n. 螺旋形，螺旋形之物；持续加剧的上升（或下降、恶化）；旋球
meaning.en: n. a plane curve traced by a point circling about the center but at increasing distances from the center; n. a curve that lies on the surface of a cylinder or cone and cuts the element at a constant angle; n. ornament consisting of a curve on a plane that winds around a center with an increasing distance from the center; n. a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops

meaning.zh: n. 精神，心灵；情绪，心境；勇气，意志，活力；（对团体、队伍、社会的）忠心，（群体中的）态度，精神；心态，态度；本质，精髓，基本精神；真实意义，实质；灵魂，鬼魂；具有特别品质的人物，在群体或活动中发挥特殊作用的人物；烈酒；挥发性液体（尤指用蒸馏法提炼的燃料）；神灵；圣灵（Spirit，Holy Spirit 的简称）; v. 偷偷带走，秘密弄走；鼓励，鼓舞
meaning.en: n. the vital principle or animating force within living things; n. the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people; n. a fundamental emotional and activating principle determining one's character; n. any incorporeal supernatural being that can become visible (or audible) to human beings

meaning.zh: n. （擦洗用的天然或人造的）海绵块；（用海绵或布）擦拭，擦洗；海绵蛋糕，松软布丁；依赖他人生活的寄生虫，揩油者；海绵（一种海洋软体动物）；（女用）避孕海绵；海绵填料；金属绵; v. 用海绵擦洗；用湿布（或海绵）擦掉，揩去；白吃，揩油；用海绵抹（漆）
meaning.en: n. a porous mass of interlacing fibers the forms the internal skeleton of various marine animals and usable to absorb water or any porous rubber or cellulose product similarly used; n. someone able to acquire new knowledge and skills rapidly and easily; n. a follower who hangs around a host (without benefit to the host) in hope of gain or advantage; n. primitive multicellular marine animal whose porous body is supported by a fibrous skeletal framework; usually occurs in sessile colonies

meaning.zh: adj. 体育运动的，与运动有关的
meaning.en: n. an active diversion requiring physical exertion and competition; n. the occupation of athletes who compete for pay; n. (Maine colloquial) a temporary summer resident of Maine; n. a person known for the way she (or he) behaves when teased or defeated or subjected to trying circumstances

meaning.zh: adj. 稳定的，牢固的；稳重的，沉稳的；（化学结构或物理状态）稳定的
meaning.en: n. a farm building for housing horses or other livestock; v. shelter in a stable; adj. resistant to change of position or condition; adj. firm and dependable; subject to little fluctuation

meaning.zh: n. 法律地位（或身份）；（尤指在社会中的）地位，身份；高级职位，社会上层地位；重视（或崇尚）程度；状况，情形
meaning.en: n. the relative position or standing of things or especially persons in a society; n. a state at a particular time

meaning.zh: adj. 平稳的，稳步的，持续的；稳定的，恒定的；稳固的，牢固的；沉着的，冷静的；（人）稳重的，可靠的; v. 使平稳，稳住；（使）稳定，（使）固定（一段时间）；（使）镇定，（使）冷静; n. 关系确定的情侣；（支撑大篷车或其他车辆的）支架，撑竿; int. 当心，冷静点; adv. 稳定地，持续地，稳固地
meaning.en: n. a person loved by another person; v. make steady; v. support or hold steady and make steadfast, with or as if with a brace; adj. not subject to change or variation especially in behavior

meaning.zh: adj. 黏性的，涂有黏性物质的；（皮肤因热而）黏湿的；（天气）湿热的，闷热的；（处境、问题等）难办的，棘手的；（网站）吸引人的，吸引人长时间浏览的；（食物）甜腻的；（价格，利率，薪水）变化缓慢的，对变化反应缓慢的；持有异议的，抱不合作态度的；持久的；感到热得难受的; n. 告事贴；置顶留言; 【名】 （Steward)（英）斯图尔特（人名）
meaning.en: A sticky note, such as a post-it note.

meaning.zh: adj. 有暴风雨的，风暴的；激烈的，冲动的；（海）波涛汹涌的，（天空）乌云密布的
meaning.en: Of or pertaining to storms.

meaning.zh: n. 焦虑，紧张；负担，紧张；张力，压力；损伤，扭伤；品种，类型；气质，个性特点；旋律，曲调；口吻，语气；（物理）应变，胁变；血缘；困难，负担; v. 拉伤，扭伤；绷紧，用力拉；竭力，使劲；过滤；使不堪忍受，使紧张；用力推（或拉），拉紧; 【名】 （Strain）（英）斯特兰（人名）
meaning.en: Treasure.

meaning.zh: n. 小河，小溪；一连串，源源不断（的事情）；（烟、气、液体的）流，股；（同龄学生按能力划分的）班，组；音像流；数据流，指令流; v. （人，东西）流动，涌动；不断地流出（液体），不断地排出（气体）；（光线）照射，照耀；（尤指在风中或水中）飘动，流动；在线收听（或收看）；按能力分班（或分组）
meaning.en: n. a natural body of running water flowing on or under the earth; n. dominant course (suggestive of running water) of successive events or ideas; n. a steady flow (usually from natural causes); n. the act of flowing or streaming; continuous progression

meaning.zh: n. 精神压力，紧张；压力，应力；强调，重要性；（单词）重音，重读，（音乐）加强音；压强；环境恶劣引起的疾病; v. 强调，着重；重读；焦虑，紧张；使受压力，使受重压; 【名】 （Stress）（意）斯特雷斯 （人名）
meaning.en: (Cause of) discomfort.

meaning.zh: v. 击，撞；（用手或武器等）打；罢工；突然想到，突然意识到；突击，袭击，进攻；（疾病、灾难等）侵袭；让（某人）觉得；引起（强烈感情）；达成，达到；行进；（时钟）敲响；发现（黄金，矿物，石油）；铸造，冲制；删除；踢球，击球；使处于特定状态；摆出（姿态）；照在……上；弹奏，奏出；划（火柴）, 击出（火星）；拆除（帐篷、帆等）；生根，附着；（渔）急拉钓线把鱼钩住；来到; n. 罢工，罢市，罢课；袭击，攻击；击，踢；（石油等宝贵资源的）发现；（投出的）好球；（棒球中的）击空；（十柱保龄球）一投全倒；不利因素；拒绝，抗拒；（地层、断层等地质特征的）走向; 【名】 （Strike）（美、俄、秘）斯特赖克（人名）
meaning.en: n. a group's refusal to work in protest against low pay or bad work conditions; n. an attack that is intended to seize or inflict damage on or destroy an objective; n. (baseball) a pitch that the batter swings at and misses, or that the batter hits into foul territory, or that the batter does not swing at but the umpire judges to be in the area over home plate and between the batter's knees and shoulders; n. a gentle blow

meaning.zh: n. 条纹，线条；（军装上表示等级的）臂章，军阶条；类型，特点
meaning.en: A long, relatively straight region of a single colour.

meaning.zh: n. 录音室，播音室，演播室；（电影）摄影棚，电影公司，电影制片厂；（画家、摄影师、雕塑家等的）工作室；（舞蹈）练习室；单室公寓房；（公司新产品的）设计室，工作室
meaning.en: n. workplace for the teaching or practice of an art; n. an apartment with a living space and a bathroom and a small kitchen; n. workplace consisting of a room or building where movies or television shows or radio programs are produced and recorded

meaning.zh: adj. 笨的，傻的，脑子不好使的；欠考虑的，糊涂的；（用以加强语气）讨厌的，恼人的，无聊的；（因醉、累等）不省人事的，神思恍惚的; n.  傻瓜，笨蛋
meaning.en: A stupid person; a fool.

meaning.zh: v. （因疾病、痛苦、悲伤等）受苦，受折磨；经受，遭受（坏事）；变差，变糟；容许，允许；受处决
meaning.en: To undergo hardship.

meaning.zh: n. （单词的）后缀，词尾；（注于代码末尾的）尾标；（数）下标字母（或数字，符号）
meaning.en: n. an affix that is added at the end of the word; v. attach a suffix to

meaning.zh: n. （政府间的）首脑会议，峰会；山顶，顶峰；（成就的）顶点，最高点；最高阶层
meaning.en: A peak; the topmost point or surface, as of a mountain.

meaning.zh: n. 日落，傍晚；晚霞，落日余晖；（法律的）自动废止期，效力消减期；衰落期（尤指人生的晚年）
meaning.en: n. the time in the evening at which the sun begins to fall below the horizon; n. atmospheric phenomena accompanying the daily disappearance of the sun; n. the daily event of the sun sinking below the horizon; adj. of a declining industry or technology

meaning.zh: n. 供给量，储备；（商品、服务的）供应量；供应，补给；生活必需品，日用品（supplies）；供应（的）；临时替代者（尤指代课教师）；议会拨给政府作开支的款项（supplies）; v. 供应，提供，供给；补充，填充；满足要求（或需要）；提供援助；替代
meaning.en: The act of supplying.

meaning.zh: adv. （用于表明你相信某事极有可能）想必，谅必；无疑，肯定；当然；绝不可能，绝对不会（用于表示不相信）；自信地；稳当地
meaning.en: Without fail.

meaning.zh: 开关
meaning.en: control

meaning.zh: n. 药片，片剂；丸；（石头、黏土等制的刻字的）牌，碑，匾；平板电脑； 便笺簿，拍纸簿； 一块肥皂；（单线）路牌；檐板； 乳脂软糖；（计算机的）输入板，手写板
meaning.en: A slab of clay used for inscription.

meaning.zh: n. （银行）出纳员；（尤指议会的）计票人；讲述者，讲故事的人；出纳机，提款机；（税务署四位收、付款）税官（之一）; 【名】 （Teller）泰勒（人名）
meaning.en: n. United States physicist (born in Hungary) who worked on the first atom bomb and the first hydrogen bomb (1908-2003); n. an official appointed to count the votes (especially in legislative assembly); n. an employee of a bank who receives and pays out money; n. someone who tells a story

meaning.zh: n. 坏脾气，暴躁脾气；心情，情绪；怒气，火气；（时代的）气息，特征；（人或动物的）性格，性情；（钢等的）硬度，回火性；沉着，冷静; v. 使缓和，使温和；使（金属）回火，锻造；给（钢琴等）调音，调整（音阶）；回火，调和
