meaning.zh: n. 陶器；陶土，黏土；制陶，陶艺；陶瓷厂；陶瓷之都（斯塔福德郡特伦特河畔斯托克市周边地区，为英国陶瓷工业基地）（the Potteries）
meaning.en: Fired ceramic wares that contain clay when formed.

meaning.zh: n. 贫穷，贫困；贫乏，低劣；个人财产权的放弃（作为宗教誓约的一部分）
meaning.en: The quality or state of being poor; lack of money

meaning.zh: 礼物
meaning.en: gift

meaning.zh: n. 隐私，秘密；清静，（不受干扰的）独处；隐居处
meaning.en: n. the quality of being secluded from the presence or view of others; n. the condition of being concealed or hidden

meaning.zh: v. 开始行动，开展；继续做（或从事、进行）；（完成其他事后）继续做某事；行进，前往；起诉某人；来自，出自; n. （某个事件或活动的）收入，收益
meaning.en: v. continue talking; v. move ahead; travel onward in time or space; v. follow a procedure or take a course; v. follow a certain course

meaning.zh: n. 步骤，程序；（自然或偶然的）变化过程；（为达到某目标的）过程，进程；制作方法，加工方法；传票；（生，剖）端突，突起; adj. （印刷）三原色的，三色版的； 经过特殊加工的；照相板的; v. （用化学物品或机器）处理，加工；审核，受理（正式文件或请求）；（计算机）处理（数据）；冲洗（照片）；加工（食品）；列队行进；把（头发）弄成直发
meaning.en: A series of events which produce a result (the product).

meaning.zh: 程序
meaning.en: software

meaning.zh: v. 承诺，保证；使很可能，预示；指望，期待（promise oneself）；把（某人，尤指女人）许配给；有指望，有前途; n. 承诺，诺言；前途，指望；迹象，预示
meaning.en: An oath or affirmation; a vow

meaning.zh: 晋升
meaning.en: advance in rank

meaning.zh: n. 代词
meaning.en: n. a function word that is used in place of a noun or noun phrase

meaning.zh: v. 提议，建议；提出（理论或解释）；提名，推荐；计划，打算；求婚；（向立法机构或委员会）提交（动议）；提议祝（酒）
meaning.en: An objective or aim.

meaning.zh: v. 保护，防护；（制订法律）保护；投保，为……买保险；对……实行贸易保护；（计算机）保护（数据或储存库）；防守
meaning.en: v. shield from danger, injury, destruction, or damage; v. use tariffs to favor domestic industry

meaning.zh: n. 抗议，反对；抗议活动；声明，断言；（多指来自公证人的）拒付证书
meaning.en: A formal objection, especially one by a group.

meaning.zh: n. 谚语，格言；典型，模范
meaning.en: n. a condensed but memorable saying embodying some important fact of experience that is taken as true by many people

meaning.zh: 取得资格
meaning.en: become certified

meaning.zh: n. 质量，品质；优质，上乘；素质，品德；特征，特质；（语音）音质，音色；（供有品位者阅读的）高质量报纸（=quality newspaper）；（占星）黄道宫运动三大特征之一; adj. 优质的，高质量的；（报纸）内容严肃的，高级的；棒极了
meaning.en: Level of excellence.

meaning.zh: n. 铁路，铁道；铁路系统，铁路公司；（其他交通工具使用的）轨道
meaning.en: n. line that is the commercial organization responsible for operating a system of transportation for trains that pull passengers or freight; n. a line of track providing a runway for wheels

meaning.zh: adv. 快速地，迅速地
meaning.en: With speed; in a rapid manner.

meaning.zh: n. 真实，现实；实际经历，见到的事物；真实感，逼真性；存在；（哲学）实在，实在性
meaning.en: The state of being actual or real.

meaning.zh: v. 重建，重造； 使复原，使恢复
meaning.en: A process or result of rebuilding.

meaning.zh: v. 要求归还；利用，改造（荒地）；回收（废品中有用的东西）；感化，使纠正
meaning.en: The calling back of a hawk.

meaning.zh: v. 恢复（健康，精神，体力）；康复，复原（be recovered）；（从不愉快的经历中）恢复；（从弱势或困境中）好转，扭转；重新获得，寻回；收回（开支、投资等）；恢复（意识、神志或身体状态）；挽回（地位），弥补（时间损失）；提取（能源或化工品等），回收利用； 给……换上新面; n. （军事操练）枪还原，收枪（the recover）; 【名】  （Recover）（西）雷科韦尔（人名）
meaning.en: Recovery.

meaning.zh: 裁判
meaning.en: official

meaning.zh: n. 拒绝，回绝；拒绝接受，拒绝给予；优先取舍权，优先购买权（first refusal）；选择权；（马）（对障碍物的）拒跳
meaning.en: The act of refusing.

meaning.zh: v. 释放，放走；放开，松开；公布，发布；发行，上映；发泄，宣泄；排放（物质）；免除，解雇；放弃，让予；放松，使松弛; n. 释放，获释；排放，泄漏；释放装置；表达，宣泄；解脱，轻松感；新发行的东西；发表，发布；（责任等的）免除； 放弃，让予； 传球；（设备的）松开
meaning.en: n. merchandise issued for sale or public showing (especially a record or film); n. the act of liberating someone or something; n. a process that liberates or discharges something; n. an announcement distributed to members of the press in order to supplement or replace an oral presentation

meaning.zh: n. 要求，请求；要求的事，点播的歌曲；（要求计算机提供信息或执行另一任务的）指令
meaning.en: n. a formal message requesting something that is submitted to an authority; n. the verbal act of requesting; v. express the need or desire for; ask for; v. ask (a person) to do something

meaning.zh: v. 需要；要求做（某事），规定
meaning.en: To ask (someone) for something; to request.

meaning.zh:
v. 预订；保留，预留；拥有，保留（某种权利）；留作，用于（特定场合）；保留（意见），推迟作出（决定或判断）；贮存，贮藏；（教会用语）弥撒仪式后保留部分圣餐; n.  储备（量），储藏（量）；含蓄，寡言；保留意见，异议；（野生生物）保护区；替补队员，后备队员；后备队，替补队（the reserves）；预备役部队，后备部队；（尤指拍卖时的）底价，最低价；（美洲土著居民的）居留地；（陶瓷装饰或纺织品印染中保留原色的）防染本色区
；（陶瓷装饰或纺织品印染中保留原色的）防染本色区; 【名】  （Reserve）（挪、美、法、俄、墨）勒塞尔夫（人名）
meaning.en: (behaviour) Restriction.

meaning.zh: v. 解决（问题或困难）；决定，下定决心；作出决议，表决；分解，转化；（使）（症状、病情）消散，消退；解析，解离；分析；（不协和音）转向协和；（当远处物体看得更清楚时）变成；（光学仪器等）分辨；辨析（图表或光谱峰值）; n. 决心，坚定的信念；正式决定，决议；决定要做的事
meaning.en: Determination; will power.

meaning.zh: n. 尊敬，敬重；重视，尊重；方面，着眼点；问候，敬意（respects）
meaning.en: An attitude of consideration or high regard

meaning.zh: v. （口头或书面）回答，回应；作出反应，回应；（对某种治疗）有良好反应；（桥牌）（对同伴的叫牌）作应叫；（会众对牧师）应答，唱和；承担责任; n. （教堂用语）应答，唱和；（建筑）壁联（与墙相连支承拱的半柱或半墩，尤指在拱廊两端）
meaning.en: A response.

meaning.zh: v. 恢复（某种情况或感受）；使复原，使复位；修复，整修；重新采用，恢复使用；归还
meaning.en: The act of recovering data or a system from a backup.

meaning.zh: vt. 使重新统一；再统一，再联合
meaning.en: v. unify again, as of a country

meaning.zh: vt. 改写；重写
meaning.en: The act of writing again or anew.

meaning.zh: adj. 起伏的，绵延的；规则的，周而复始的；（走路）左右摇晃的，摇摆的；（水面）汹涌澎湃的；旋转的
meaning.en: n. a deep prolonged sound (as of thunder or large bells); n. the act of robbing a helpless person; n. propelling something on wheels; adj. characterized by reverberation

meaning.zh: n. 常规，惯例；生活乏味，无聊；（演出中的）一套动作，一系列笑话（等）；（为达到特定目的的）老一套，俗套；（计算机）例行程序; adj. 常规的，例行的；平常的，毫不特别的；平淡乏味的; v.  按惯例安排
meaning.en: n. an unvarying or habitual method or procedure; n. a short theatrical performance that is part of a longer program; n. a set sequence of steps, part of larger computer program; adj. occurring at fixed times or predictable intervals

meaning.zh: n. 垃圾，废弃物；毫无价值的东西，劣质产品；废话，瞎说
meaning.en: Refuse, waste, garbage, junk, trash.

meaning.zh: adj. 逃亡的；逃走的
meaning.en: n. an easy victory; n. someone who flees from an uncongenial situation; adj. completely out of control

meaning.zh: n. 悲伤，悲痛；使人悲伤的事（或难过）的事
meaning.en: The state or emotion of being sad.

meaning.zh: v. 撒，播撒；（使）散开，（使）散布在各处；（物理）散射（电磁辐射或粒子）；（棒球）（被击中但没有得分的）有效投（球）; n. 零星散布的东西；（统计）（对某一变量作反复测量或观察所得数值的）离差；（物理）（光、其他电磁波或粒子的）散射
meaning.en: The act of scattering or dispersing.

meaning.zh: n. 学者；有学问的人；奖学金获得者；聪颖勤奋的学生
meaning.en: n. a learned person (especially in the humanities); someone who by long study has gained mastery in one or more disciplines; n. someone (especially a child) who learns (as from a teacher) or takes up knowledge or beliefs; n. a student who holds a scholarship

meaning.zh:
v. （用指甲）挠，轻抓；（用指甲或利器）抓破，划破；划出，刮出（痕迹）；（用爪子）抓，刨；（鸟、哺乳动物，尤指鸡）用嘴（或爪子）扒地找食物；寻觅（难找的人或物）（scratch for）；艰难生活（scratch along）；勾掉，划去（写下的字）； 仓促写下；（用尖利物）刮擦出声音； 取消，撤销（想法或计划）；（使）退出比赛；（用刮擦技法）播放唱片; n. （某人皮肤上的）划痕，划伤；刮痕，划痕；抓，挠；刮擦声
；唱片的嚓嚓声（指唱片纹道与唱针的摩擦噪声）；刮擦（多用于快板乐中，用手制止唱片转动，使其来回移动发出有节奏的嚓嚓声的技巧）；（高尔夫）零让步（表明选手不弱，能在场上达到规定击球的次数）； 钱; adj. （球队或一群人等）仓促拼凑的，匆匆组成的；（高尔夫球员）无让杆的，无让步优待的；碰巧的；打草稿用的
meaning.en: n. an abraded area where the skin is torn or worn off; n. a depression scratched or carved into a surface; n. informal terms for money; n. dry mash for poultry

meaning.zh: n. 海藻，海草
meaning.en: Any of numerous marine plants and algae, such as a kelp.

meaning.zh: adj. 自私的，利己的
meaning.en: adj. concerned chiefly or only with yourself and your advantage to the exclusion of others

meaning.zh: adj. 严重的，危急的；认真的，严肃的；重要的，须重视的；（音乐、文学等艺术）严肃的；（人）庄重的，严肃的；大量的，极多的；（恋爱中）态度认真的；极感兴趣的，热衷的；很好的，质优价高的
meaning.en: adj. concerned with work or important matters rather than play or trivialities; adj. of great consequence; adj. causing fear or anxiety by threatening great harm; adj. appealing to the mind

meaning.zh: n. 公共服务系统，公共事业；（服务性行业或机构所提供的）服务；（对顾客的）接待，招待；工作，效劳；服务费；政府机构，公务部门；兵役，军队；（机器的）使用；仆人，佣人； 服务站；宗教仪式；检修，保养；整套餐具；发球，发球方式；班车，车次；（法律文件的）送达; v. 维修，检修；支付（债务）利息；为……提供服务；（雄性动物）与（雌性动物）交配; adj. 员工专用的； 部队的；提供服务的; 【名】 （Service）（英）瑟维斯（人名）
meaning.en: An act of being of assistance to someone.

meaning.zh: n. （某项活动的）一段时间，一场；（议会等的）会议，（法庭的）开庭；学年，上课时间；（酒吧中）演奏会（尤指演奏爱尔兰音乐）；（尤指录音师的）灌录音乐时间；酗酒期；基督教长老会的管理机构; adj. （音乐家）伴奏的
meaning.en: n. a meeting for execution of a group's functions; n. the time during which a school holds classes; n. a meeting devoted to a particular activity; n. a meeting of spiritualists

meaning.zh: n. （某事发生的）环境，场合；（戏剧、小说或电影的）场景，背景；舞台布景；（设备的）档位；（宝石的）镶嵌底座；（为诗、祷文等谱写的）乐曲；（供一人用的）一副餐具; v. （小心地）放置；嵌入（表面）；（电影、戏剧、故事等）以……为背景（set 的现在分词形式）
meaning.en: To put (something) down, to rest.

meaning.zh: n. 移居者；殖民者
meaning.en: n. a person who settles in a new colony or moves into new country; n. a negotiator who settles disputes; n. a clerk in a betting shop who calculates the winnings

meaning.zh: adj. 幽暗的，多阴影的；昏暗的，朦胧的；鲜为人知的，神秘莫测的；虚无的，虚幻的
meaning.en: In shadow; darkened by shadows.

meaning.zh: adj. 浅的，不深的；肤浅的，浅薄的；（呼吸）浅的，微弱的；平缓的；靠近内线的
meaning.en: A shallow portion of an otherwise deep body of water.

meaning.zh: n. 居所，住处；（尤指用以躲避风雨或攻击的）遮蔽物，庇护处；遮蔽，庇护；（人或动物）收容所
meaning.en: A refuge, haven or other cover or protection from something.

meaning.zh: n. 州长；郡治安官；执行吏
meaning.en: n. the principal law-enforcement officer in a county

meaning.zh: adj. 吃惊的，震惊的；愤慨的，十分厌恶的
meaning.en: adj. struck with fear, dread, or consternation

meaning.zh: n. 购物者；顾客
meaning.en: A person who shops.

meaning.zh: adv. 不久，很快，立刻；简短地，扼要地；（说话）不耐烦地，不友善地
meaning.en: In a short or brief time or manner; quickly.

meaning.zh: n. 奴隶制，蓄奴；奴隶身份，奴役；过分依赖，过分投入
meaning.en: n. the state of being under the control of another person; n. the practice of owning slaves; n. work done under harsh conditions for little or no pay

meaning.zh: adv. 以某种方式，用某种方法；由于某种不明原因，不知为什么
meaning.en: adv. in some unspecified way or manner; or by some unspecified means; adv. for some unspecified reason

meaning.zh: v. 闪烁，闪耀；生气勃勃，热情奔放；（眼睛）发亮；（酒类饮料）起泡
meaning.en: A little spark; a scintillation.

meaning.zh: n. 菠菜
meaning.en: A particular edible plant, Spinacia oleracea, or its leaves.

meaning.zh: n. 赞助者，赞助商；（培训或教育的）资助者；（慈善活动的）捐款者，捐资机构；法案的倡议者；担保人，保证人；（宗教事宜中的）引领人; v. 赞助（活动、节目等）； 为慈善活动捐资，为义赛捐款；倡议，提交（法案等）；主办，促成；纵容；为……担保
meaning.en: n. someone who supports or champions something; n. an advocate who presents a person (as for an award or a degree or an introduction etc.); v. assume sponsorship of; v. assume responsibility for or leadership of

meaning.zh: n. （有图或文字的）粘贴标签，贴纸；坚持不懈者；尖刀；难题
meaning.en: Something or someone that sticks.

meaning.zh: n. 储存，贮藏；（信息的）存储，存储空间；（家具等的）存放，保管；储存空间，储藏场所；仓库费，仓租
meaning.en: The act of storing goods; the state of being stored.

meaning.zh: v. （使）变大，拉长；（布料）可伸缩，有弹性；伸展肢体；伸出，伸长（胳膊或腿）；拉紧，拽紧；（时间上）延续；（空间上）延伸，绵延；使竭尽所能，使施展本领；耗尽，竭尽（财力或物力）；（使）延长使用，节俭地使用；（资金，资源）足够，够用；放宽，放松；夸大，夸张；涉及，囊括; n. （土地或水域的）一片，一段；（时间）连续的一段，持续；（肢体）伸展，伸开；弹性，伸缩性；服刑期；（终点前的）直线跑道；言过其实的话；困难的任务，苛求的任务；加长轿车；抢风航行的距离; adj. （织物）有弹性的，有弹力的; 【名】 （Stretch）（美）斯特雷奇（人名）
meaning.en: An act of stretching.

meaning.zh: adj. （人）吃饱的，吃撑的；填制的，填充以保持形状的；（被鼻涕）塞住的
meaning.en: adj. filled with something; adj. crammed with food

meaning.zh: v. 绊脚，绊跌；跌跌撞撞地走，蹒跚而行；结结巴巴地说；偶然发现；（努力要获得某物时）出岔子，出差错；失足；使……困惑；使……绊倒; n. 绊倒；跌跌撞撞地走，蹒跚而行；错误，差错
meaning.en: A fall, trip or substantial misstep.

meaning.zh: adj. 时髦的，流行的，有格调的；潇洒的
meaning.en: Having elegance or taste or refinement in manners or dress.

meaning.zh: n. 自杀；自杀者；自杀性的行为，自取灭亡的行为；（篮球中的）自杀训练
meaning.en: (uncountable) The act of intentionally killing oneself.

meaning.zh: n. 日晷，日规；羽扇豆（产于美国东部）
meaning.en: n. timepiece that indicates the daylight hours by the shadow that the gnomon casts on a calibrated dial

meaning.zh: n. 日出（时分），黎明；晨曦，朝霞；（Sunrise）森赖斯（弗罗里达州一城市）
meaning.en: n. the first light of day; n. atmospheric phenomena accompanying the daily appearance of the sun; n. the daily event of the sun rising above the horizon; adj. of an industry or technology; new and developing

meaning.zh: v. 支持，拥护，鼓励；帮助，援助；支撑，承受（人或建筑物等的重量）；供养，赡养；资助，赞助；追随（或支持）（某个运动队）；证实，确认；（计算机，操作系统）支持（程序，语言，装置的）运行 ；支持……的生存；忍受，容忍；（在流行音乐会上）当助演，担任演出嘉宾；支付……费用，（尤指）用钱维持（不良嗜好，如毒品）；胜任; n. 支持，拥护；帮助，援助；赞助，资助；支撑物，支柱；（身体部位的）支持器，托；支撑，支承；（音乐会、演出的）助演演员，助演乐队；证实，证明；信息供应，信息支持；（战争中的）支援；抚养，供养；支持者，拥护者
meaning.en: (sometimes attributive) Something which supports.

meaning.zh: v. 推断，料想，猜想；假设，假定，设想；预期，需要，以……为条件；相信，认为（某事物是可能的）；（婉转表达）我看，要我说，要不；（因处于某种境地或因约定）必须做（be supposed to do sth.）；我看（用于生气地表示预料某事属实）
meaning.en: v. express a supposition; v. expect, believe, or suppose; v. to believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds; v. take for granted or as a given; suppose beforehand

meaning.zh: n. 表面；水面，地面；桌面，台面；（物体的）一个面；外表，表象；表面积；运动场地，运动场地面铺设材料; v. 浮出水面；（信息、情感或问题）显露，暴露，公开；（失踪或隐藏后）出现；（尤指长睡后）起床；给（道路等）铺上硬面; adj. 表面上的，外表上的；表面的；（与空中运输相对的）水陆运输的；水面舰船的（与潜水艇相对）；表层的
meaning.en: n. the outer boundary of an artifact or a material layer constituting or resembling such a boundary; n. the extended two-dimensional outer boundary of a three-dimensional object; n. the outermost level of the land or sea; n. a superficial aspect as opposed to the real nature of something

meaning.zh: n. 外科医生

meaning.zh: n. 外科手术；诊所；（议员的）接待时间；应诊时间；手术室

meaning.zh: v. 猜想，认为（某事有可能）；怀疑……有罪，认为……有嫌疑；不信任，怀疑……的真实性

meaning.zh: n. （飞机、直升机等的）起飞；（经济、生意等的）开始腾飞，迅速发展；（对他人言行的）滑稽模仿；（写作、音乐等的）娱乐性模仿；起跳；创新，跨越

meaning.zh: n. 紧张，焦虑；紧张关系，紧张局势；矛盾，冲突；（电线、绳子、肌肉等的）拉紧，绷紧；拉力，张力；（电影、书籍中的）紧张情绪，恐怖气氛；（编织的）针织密度；电压; v. 使拉紧，使紧张

meaning.zh: prep. 穿过，从一端到另一端；透过（玻璃、窗户等）；越过（地区或空间），在……之间；断开，洞穿；（在应停处）径直通过；以，凭借；贯穿，遍及；自始至终，从头至尾；直至；彻底地（查看或检查）；经历，度过；胜利完成；（提议、观点）获得通过，得到批准; adv. 从一端到另一端；完全地，彻底地，十足地；接通电话；通过（障碍、阶段或测试）；直达，迳直；从头至尾；到（某个阶段或某种程度）；切断， 凿穿；胜利完成; adj.  完成的，结束的；直达的，直通的，中途不停的；断绝的；（公路）对穿的，双向的；（房间）与楼两对面通透的；（竞赛队，竞技者）进入下一轮（比赛）的

meaning.en: n. any place of complete bliss and delight and peace; n. (Christianity) the abode of righteous souls after death

meaning.zh: vt. 使麻痹；使瘫痪

meaning.zh: adj. 父母的，双亲的；亲代的，亲本的；母公司的，上级的
meaning.en: A person fulfilling a parental role.

meaning.zh: 护照
meaning.en: travel document

meaning.zh: 密码
meaning.en: secret code

meaning.zh: n. 耐心；耐性；忍耐力；考验某人的耐心；单人纸牌游戏

meaning.zh: adj. 奇怪的，不寻常的；特别的，独特的；不舒服的
meaning.en: adj. beyond or deviating from the usual or expected; adj. unique or specific to a person or thing or category; adj. markedly different from the usual; adj. characteristic of one only; distinctive or special

meaning.zh: v. 说服，劝服；使相信，使信服；（情形，事件）驱使，敦促
meaning.en: v. win approval or support for; v. cause somebody to adopt a certain position, belief, or course of action; twist somebody's arm

meaning.zh: n. 药店；（医院的）药房，配药室；药剂学，配药学；一批备用药品

meaning.zh: n. 平台；讲台，舞台；讲台上的人（the platform）；（火车站的）月台；（公共汽车上供乘客上下车的）踏脚台；发言机会，论坛；契机；（政党的）纲领；厚底鞋；计算机平台；（海上）钻井平台；（供人上下小船的）水上平台；（火箭或导弹的）卫星发射平台
meaning.en: n. a raised horizontal surface; n. a document stating the aims and principles of a political party; n. the combination of a particular computer and a particular operating system; n. any military structure or vehicle bearing weapons

meaning.zh: adv. 有礼貌地；客气地；委婉地；殷勤地
meaning.en: In a polite manner

meaning.zh: n. 政治，政治活动（事务）；政治事业；政治学；(某团体、组织等内的）争权活动，权术；政治信仰，政治观点；（尤指跟社会权力和地位有关的领域、理论或活动的）主张，观（念）；政治思想体系，政治局势
meaning.en: To engage in political activity; politick.

meaning.zh: adj. 乐观的，有信心的；积极的，建设性的；良好的，有助益的；赞成的，支持的；确信的，肯定的；完全的，绝对的；证据确凿的，明确的；阳性的；正数的，大于零的；正电的，正极的；（摄影）正片的，正像的；（语法）（形容词，副词）原级的；（主哲）实证的，实在的；（占星）（风宫，火宫）积极的; n. 优势，优点；阳性结果；正片；正极，阳极；正数；（语法）原级形容词，原级副词
meaning.en: A thing capable of being affirmed; something real or actual.

meaning.zh: n. 明信片
meaning.en: n. a card for sending messages by post without an envelope

meaning.zh: adj. 宝贵的，珍贵的；珍视的，重要的；珍稀的，珍奇的；（表示气愤）宝贝似的；（言行）矫揉造作的，过分讲究的；可爱的，讨人喜欢的; n. （用作称呼）宝贝，亲爱的; adv. 非常，极其; 【名】 （Precious）（英）普雷舍斯，普雷舍丝（人名）
meaning.en: Someone (or something) who is loved; a darling.

meaning.zh: adj. 怀孕的，妊娠的；意味深长的，意义重大的

meaning.zh: adj. 有准备的，准备好的；打算做，乐意做；提前准备好的
meaning.en: adj. made ready or fit or suitable beforehand; adj. having made preparations; adj. equipped or prepared with necessary intellectual resources

meaning.zh: n. 出席，存在；（某人的）所在地方；感觉中的存在物（如鬼魂）；驻扎部队，驻扎的警力；风度，气质；（公司在某地的）工人（或产品），势力
meaning.en: n. the state of being present; current existence; n. the immediate proximity of someone or something; n. an invisible spiritual being felt to be nearby; n. the impression that something is present

meaning.zh: v. 保护，维护；保持，维持；腌制，保存（食物）；禁止他人捕猎
meaning.en: A sweet spread made of any of a variety of fruits.

meaning.zh: adj. 以前的，先前的；（时间或顺序上）稍前的；过早的，过急的
meaning.en: adj. (used especially of persons) of the immediate past; adj. too soon or too hasty; adj. just preceding something else in time or order

meaning.zh: n. 犯人，囚犯；俘虏，战俘；为……所困的人
meaning.en: noun. A person incarcerated in a prison, while on trial or serving a sentence.; noun. Any person held against their will.

meaning.zh: 宣布，宣告
meaning.en: To announce or declare.

meaning.zh: n. 生产者制造商，生产公司（国）；（人或物）造成者，生产者；（电影、广播戏剧、歌剧等的）制片主任，监制人；（音乐录音的）监制人；发生器
meaning.en: n. someone who manufactures something; n. someone who finds financing for and supervises the making and presentation of a show (play or film or program or similar work); n. something that produces

meaning.zh: n. 进步，进展；前进，行进；（社会的）进步
meaning.en: n. gradual improvement or growth or development; n. the act of moving forward toward a goal; n. a movement forward; v. develop in a positive way

meaning.zh: adv. 正确地，适当地；得体地，恰当地；实际上，严格地说；彻底地，完全地
meaning.en: adv. in the right manner; adv. with reason or justice

meaning.zh: n. 所有物，财产；地产，房地产；房地产股票（或投资）（properties）； 所有权，处置权；特性，性质
meaning.en: Something that is owned.

meaning.zh: n. 提议，建议；提案；（计划、建议等的）提出；求婚
meaning.en: n. something proposed (such as a plan or assumption); n. an offer of marriage; n. the act of making a proposal

meaning.zh: conj. 假如，只要，在……条件下
meaning.en: To make a living; earn money for necessities.

meaning.zh: adv. 公开地，公然地；由政府；由公众；公众可以获取（或购买）地
meaning.en: In public, openly, in an open and public manner.

meaning.zh: n. 套衫
meaning.en: n. a sweater that is put on by pulling it over the head

meaning.zh: n. 量，数目；大量，大批；（尤指和质量相对的）数量；（语音）音量；值，参量；代表数量（或参量）的数（或符号）
meaning.en: n. how much there is of something that you can quantify; n. an adequate or large amount; n. something that has a magnitude and can be represented in mathematical expressions by a constant or a variable

meaning.zh: n. 铁路，铁轨；铁路公司，铁路部门
meaning.en: n. line that is the commercial organization responsible for operating a system of transportation for trains that pull passengers or freight; n. a line of track providing a runway for wheels; v. compel by coercion, threats, or crude means; v. supply with railroad lines

meaning.zh: n. 降雨；降雨量
meaning.en: The amount of rain that falls on a single occasion

meaning.zh: adj. （想法、决定等）合理的，基于理性的；（人）理性的，理智的；富有理性的；（数）有理的，有理数的; n. 有理数
meaning.en: n. an integer or a fraction; adj. consistent with or based on or using reason; adj. of or associated with or requiring the use of the mind; adj. capable of being expressed as a quotient of integers

meaning.zh: n. 康复，痊愈；戒除；恢复，复苏；（供刚做完手术的病人使用的）监护室；（被拿走或失去的东西的）复得，找回；收回的物品（资金）；（破损车辆或坠毁飞机）回收修理；（高尔夫）挽回败局之击，复原之击（击回球道或球穴区）；（美橄）重新获球；（划船，自行车赛，游泳）还原至预备姿势（如回桨等）；回收利用（能源、化工品等）
meaning.en: n. return to an original state; n. gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury; n. the act of regaining or saving something lost (or in danger of becoming lost)

meaning.zh: adj. 回收利用的；可循环再造的
meaning.en: To break down and reuse component materials.

meaning.zh: adj. 地区的，区域的；（与）首都以外各地（有关）的
meaning.en: An entity or event with scope limited to a single region.

meaning.zh: n. 登记表，注册簿；注册员；（人或乐器的）声区，音区；（适合特定场合使用的）语体风格，语域；（印刷，摄影）套准，叠合；现金出纳机；（电子设备的）寄存器；（供暖或制冷设备的）调风口，节气门；（设计图案组成的）条，局部; v. 登记，注册；（正式地或公开地）发表意见，提出主张；流露出，表达出；注意到，受到注意；（仪器上）显出，显示；把……挂号邮寄；取得（结果），得（分）；（印刷，摄影）套准，叠合; 【名】 （Register）（美）雷吉斯特（人名）
meaning.en: n. an official written record of names or events or transactions; n. (music) the timbre that is characteristic of a certain range and manner of production of the human voice or of different pipe organ stops or of different musical instruments; n. a book in which names and transactions are listed; n. (computer science) memory device that is the part of computer memory that has a specific address and that is used to hold information of a specific kind

meaning.zh: n. （人或物间的）联系；（国家、公司、组织等之间的）（正式）关系； 性关系；亲戚，亲属；讲述，叙述
meaning.en: The manner in which two things may be associated.

meaning.zh: n. 亲戚，亲属；同类事物，亲缘动物（或植物）；（语法）关系代词，关系限定词，关系副词；（哲学）关系项；相关物; adj. 相比较而言的，比较的；相对的，相关联的；（语法）（代词、限定词或副词）关系的，（从句）由关系词引导的；（乐）（大小调）调号相同的；（与不同军种的军阶）相应（或对应）的； 关于（或涉及到）......的；相比之下存在（或有）的

meaning.zh: adj. 令人轻松的，愉快的

meaning.zh: adj. 可靠的，可信赖的；真实可信的，确凿的；（汽车、设备、系统等）耐用的，性能稳定的

meaning.zh: n. 宗教信仰；宗教，教派；痴迷的活动，极爱好的活动
meaning.en: n. a strong belief in a supernatural power or powers that control human destiny; n. an institution to express belief in a divine power

meaning.zh: n. 共和国，共和政体
meaning.en: n. a political system in which the supreme power lies in a body of citizens who can elect people to represent them; n. a form of government whose head of state is not a monarch

meaning.zh: v. 像，与……相似
meaning.en: v. appear like; be similar or bear a likeness to

meaning.zh: n. 居民，住户；（旅馆的）住宿者；住院医生； 寄宿制学校学生；（英国政府派驻半独立国家的） 特派代表；驻外特工；留鸟，无迁徙习性的蝴蝶（或其他动物）; adj. （在某地）居住的，居留的；常驻的；属于（某个群体）的；（鸟、蝴蝶等）非迁徙性的；（计算机程序、文件等在存储器中）驻留的

meaning.zh: n. 自然资源；资源（指钱、物、人等）；有助于实现目标的东西，资料；（对付困境所需的）个人素质（resources）；（逆境中的）出路，应付办法； 谋略，智谋; v. 向……提供资金（或设备）
meaning.en: n. available source of wealth; a new or reserve supply that can be drawn upon when needed; n. a source of aid or support that may be drawn upon when needed; n. the ability to deal resourcefully with unusual problems

meaning.zh: v. 限制，控制（大小、数量、范围）；限制（活动或行为），妨碍；约束，管束；（以法规）限制；封锁（消息）
meaning.en: To restrain within boundaries; to limit; to confine

meaning.zh: n. 修改，修订；修订本，订正版；复习，温习
meaning.en: The process of revising:

meaning.zh: n. 路边；路旁
meaning.en: The area on either side of a road.

meaning.zh: n. 推销员；售货员
meaning.en: n. a man salesperson

meaning.zh: n. 炖锅；深平底锅
meaning.en: n. a deep pan with a handle; used for stewing or boiling

meaning.zh: n. 海水
meaning.en: The saltwater of a sea or ocean.

meaning.zh: adv. 秘密地；暗自感觉地，私底下地
meaning.en: In secret, covertly.

meaning.zh: n. 保护措施，安全工作；保安部门；安检处；保障，保证；安全，安全感；抵押品，保证金；证券，债券
meaning.en: n. the state of being free from danger or injury; n. a formal declaration that documents a fact of relevance to finance and investment; the holder has a right to receive interest or dividends; n. a department responsible for the security of the institution's property and workers; n. measures taken as a precaution against theft or espionage or sabotage etc.

meaning.zh: n. 顺序，次序；连续事件（或动作、事物）；（电影中表现同一主题或场面的）一组镜头；（生物学中分子或基因的排列）顺序；模进；（纸牌的）同花顺；序列；（天主教弥撒中圣歌与福音之间的）继续经; v. 按顺序排列；测定（整套基因或分子成分的）序列；用音序器播放（或录制）音乐
meaning.en: A set of things next to each other in a set order; a series

meaning.zh: adv. 非常严重地；严厉地，严肃地；朴素地，朴实无华地
meaning.en: In a severe manner.

meaning.zh: adj. 丢脸的，可耻的
meaning.en: Causing or meriting shame or disgrace; disgraceful

meaning.zh: adj. 令人震惊的；可怕的，令人厌恶的；糟糕的
meaning.en: adj. glaringly vivid and graphic; marked by sensationalism; adj. giving offense to moral sensibilities and injurious to reputation

meaning.zh: n. 短缺，不足
meaning.en: A lack or deficiency; an insufficient amount.

meaning.zh: n. 疾病；呕吐；弊病
meaning.en: The quality or state of being sick or diseased; illness.

meaning.zh: n. 人行道
meaning.en: n. walk consisting of a paved area for pedestrians; usually beside a street or roadway

meaning.zh: n. 路标；指示牌
meaning.en: A post bearing a sign that gives information on directions

meaning.zh: v. 使简易，简化
meaning.en: v. make simpler or easier or reduce in complexity or extent

meaning.zh: n. 骨骼，骨架；梗概，提纲；骨瘦如柴的人（或动物）；（建筑物、桥梁等的）框架，骨架；（维持运转所需的）最少人员，基干人员；钢架雪车; adj. （员工）最基本的，基干的
meaning.en: n. something reduced to its minimal form; n. a scandal that is kept secret; n. the hard structure (bones and cartilages) that provides a frame for the body of an animal; n. the internal supporting structure that gives an artifact its shape

meaning.zh: adv. 稍微，轻微地；（指某人身材）纤弱地，瘦小地
meaning.en: Slenderly; delicately.

meaning.zh: adv. 在社会上；在社交方面；善于交际地
meaning.en: In a social manner; sociably.

meaning.zh: adv. 在（将来或过去的）某个时候
meaning.en: Former, erstwhile; at some previous time.

meaning.zh: adj. 在南方的，向南的；南方的；美国南部地区的（Southern）；（风）从南面吹来的
meaning.en: adj. in or characteristic of a region of the United States south of (approximately) the Mason-Dixon line; adj. situated in or oriented toward the south; adj. situated in or coming from regions of the south; adj. from the south; used especially of wind

meaning.zh: n. 纪念品，纪念物
meaning.en: n. something of sentimental value; n. a reminder of past events

meaning.zh: n. 拼写，拼写能力；拼法，拼读
meaning.en: n. forming words with letters according to the principles underlying accepted usage

meaning.zh: n. （品质的）标准，水平，规范；正常的水平，应达到的标准；行为标准，道德水准（standards）；（小学）（考试达到的）级别；法定度量衡标准；旗杆；流行曲调（或歌曲）；茎干挺直的树（或灌木）；（植）（蝶形花的）旗瓣；（植）（鸢尾属植物的）直立花瓣；直立水管（或煤气管）; adj. 普通的，标准的；（大小、尺寸、式样等）常规的，一般性的；权威的，广泛认可的；（语言）合乎规范的，符合标准的；茎干挺直的树（或灌木）；（整成树形并嫁接于挺直茎干上的）灌木
meaning.en: A principle or example or measure used for comparison.

meaning.zh: adv. 逐渐地，稳步地；不变地，稳定地；冷静地，镇定地；固定地，牢固地
meaning.en: In a steady manner.

meaning.zh: adj. 焦虑的，紧张的；（物体）受重压的，受应力的；有重音的，重读的
meaning.en: To apply force to (a body or structure) causing strain.

meaning.zh: adj. 受灾的，患病的，受困扰的；（脸或表情）非常悲痛的，极其忧伤的
meaning.en: Struck by something.

meaning.zh: v. 奋斗，努力；搏斗，扭打，挣扎脱身；争夺，争抢；奋力前进，艰难行进
meaning.en: n. an energetic attempt to achieve something; n. an open clash between two opposing groups (or individuals); n. strenuous effort; v. make a strenuous or labored effort

meaning.zh: adj. （人）固执的，倔强的；难以去除（对付，使用）的
meaning.en: Stubbornness.

meaning.zh: adj. 极好的，极吸引人的；令人震惊的
meaning.en: adj. commanding attention; adj. causing great astonishment and consternation; adj. causing or capable of causing bewilderment or shock or insensibility; adj. strikingly beautiful or attractive

meaning.zh: adv. 突然地，出乎意料地
meaning.en: adv. happening unexpectedly; adv. quickly and without warning; adv. on impulse; without premeditation

meaning.zh: v. 沐日光浴；晒太阳
meaning.en: A sunbathing session: a sunbath.

meaning.zh: adj. （规模或实力）更大的，更强的，(在品质上)更好的；（尤用于广告中指产品或服务）高质量的，优质的；上级的，（在级别、重要性或职位上）更高的；有优越感的，高傲的，傲慢的；在其他器官之上的；（字母，数字，符号）上标的；（花的子房）上位的，（子房）在萼上的; n. 上级，上司；优胜者，高手；修道院院长（或其他宗教机构的负责人）；（印刷）上标字母（或数字、符号）
meaning.en: A person of higher rank or quality.

meaning.zh: n. 不寻常的事件，意外之事；惊奇，惊讶；令某人意外惊喜的事物（如礼物、旅行等）；出其不意（出人意料）的方法；让人大吃一惊的人；（鸣钟术）一种复杂的敲奏编钟的方法; v. 使（某人）吃惊；意外发现，当场抓获，突然袭击；给……惊喜，使喜出望外; int. 感到惊奇吧！; adj. 令人惊奇的，意外的
meaning.en: Something unexpected.

meaning.zh: v. 围绕，环绕；（军队，警察等）包围；与……紧密相连（或相关）；喜欢结交（某类人），身边总有（某类东西）; n. （物品的）边，饰边；周围的事物，环境
meaning.en: n. the area in which something exists or lives; v. be around; v. extend on all sides of simultaneously; encircle; v. envelop completely

meaning.zh: n. 继续生存，存活，幸存；遗留物，幸存物，残存物
meaning.en: The fact or act of surviving; continued existence or life.

meaning.zh: n. （灾难性事故中的）幸存者，生还者，幸存物；能在艰苦环境中生存的人，挺过困难者；（死者的）尚在世的家人，遗属；遭遇过（不幸经历）的人，经受过（苦难）的人；留存的人（或物），继续发挥作用的人（或物），竞赛中的过关者；幸存的公司；（共有财产产主中的）存者

meaning.zh: n. 环境保护主义者，环境保护论者；环境艺术家
meaning.en: n. someone who works to protect the environment from destruction or pollution

meaning.zh: n. 误解，误会；小争执，分歧
meaning.en: n. putting the wrong interpretation on; n. an understanding of something that is not correct

meaning.zh: 公共交通：为大众提供的交通服务，例如公共汽车、地铁、有轨电车等。
meaning.en: n. conveyance for passengers or mail or freight

meaning.zh: 中学：介于小学和大学之间的学校，通常提供普通、技术、职业或大学预备课程。
meaning.en: Any flight feather attached to the ulna (forearm) of a bird.

meaning.zh: 天气预报：对未来天气的预测，通常是针对特定地区的，在报纸、广播或电视上发布。
meaning.en: n. a forecast of the weather

meaning.zh: 社交网络：在线上建立和维护个人和商业关系的活动。
meaning.en: A festive gathering to foster introductions.

meaning.zh: 不定冠词：英语中用来指代未被确定或具体指定的人或物的词语，如a或an。
meaning.en: n. a determiner (as `a' or `some' in English) that indicates nonspecific reference

meaning.zh: n. 电信，电讯
meaning.en: n. (often plural) systems used in transmitting messages over a distance electronically; n. (often plural) the branch of electrical engineering concerned with the technology of electronic communication at a distance
